T02TD2906E:278a-1: shat mandal bi dhi n'a ma /
T02TD2906E:278a-3: dkyil 'khor drug gi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02TD2906E:278a-4: bcom ldan 'das rod rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2906E:278a-5: chu klung dam nags tshal lam chu bo'i 'gram mam ri sul lam phug gam yid dang mthun pa yul dpen pa bas mtha'i dgon par slob dpon gtsug lag la mkhas pa chos la dga' ba bslab ba bsrung ba 'grogs na bde ba snying rje can /
T02TD2906E:278a-6: dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba thob pa /
T02TD2906E:278a-7: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las la dga' ba bya ba nyung zhing 'dod zhen chung ba /
T02TD2906E:278a-8: rig sngags kyi 'bras kyi 'bras bu rmi lam gyi rtags dang dngos grub thob pa dang /
T02TD2906E:278a-9: sgrub pa'i 'grogs po rigs btsun pa /
T02TD2906E:278a-10: chos spyod pa dad pa can /
T02TD2906E:278a-11: sems stobs che zhing brtson 'grus can /
T02TD2906E:278a-12: bden par smra zhing rim gro can /
T02TD2906E:278a-13: gzugs ha cang mi ring mi thung ba /
T02TD2906E:278a-14: mi sbom zhing mi skam pa /
T02TD2906E:278a-15: sdo bsangs sdug bsngal bzod cing brtan pa /
T02TD2906E:278a-16: gsang sngags zlos shing dam tshig shes pa /
T02TD2906E:278a-17: bsam pa bzang zhing mi skyo ba gzhan gyis brid kyang 'phags pa'i tshul mi gtong ba'i grogs dang lhan cig tu mandal byas nas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02TD2906E:278a-18: rab tu dri zhim po'i me tog dang /
T02TD2906E:278a-19: rtsa ba dang sdong bu la sogs pa sbyar ba'i spos dang /
T02TD2906E:278a-20: gur gum la sogs pa'i dri dang /
T02TD2906E:278a-21: sman gyi rdog gu thams cad dang /
T02TD2906E:278a-22: kha ba dang tsha ba dang /
T02TD2906E:278a-23: bro ba dag thams cad kyang 'bras chan dang ldan pa rdo rje'i rigs la dbul bar gsungs so //
T02TD2906E:278a-24: de ltar sgrub ba'i yan lag gi rdzas bstan nas /
T02TD2906E:278a-25: sgrub pa'i lus ngag yid gsum gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni //
T02TD2906E:278a-26: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dang phyag rgya dang dman ma la mi bgom //
T02TD2906E:278a-28: la phug dang sgog pa dang //
T02TD2906E:278a-29: tshva dang skyur po dri mi zhim pa rnams mi bza'/
T02TD2906E:278a-32: glu dang gad mo dang rtsed mo dang rtag gad rnams mi bya /
T02TD2906E:278a-33: don med pa'i gtam dang mu stegs can dang rtsod pa mi bya /
T02TD2906E:278a-34: gdol pa dang ma rabs dang kha shags mi bya /
T02TD2906E:278a-35: lha dang drang srong rnams la zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed //
T02TD2906E:278b-0: ngan pa rnams la mi brnyas @278b bla ma dang rdo rje spun la zhe sdang gis mi smad /
T02TD2906E:278b-2: de ltar sgrub pa'i yan lag bsten nas /
T02TD2906E:278b-3: lus kyi kun du spyod pa ni thun gsum du khrus byas te /
T02TD2906E:278b-4: aom h'um ha na badzra ni ha sa lan 'ga' bzlas nas ro stod dang ro smad la bsku ba dang /
T02TD2906E:278b-5: aom badzra ha ra h'um ra h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis chu'i bgegs bsal la /
T02TD2906E:278b-6: na mo badzra ya aom h'um dh'u na dh'u na ma tha ma tha bi dhv'an sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:278b-7: zhes pas 'khrud cing bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags rings kyis bgegs bskrad la khrus byas nas /
T02TD2906E:278b-8: aom aa mri te h'um phat ces pas khrus zin pa'i rting la chu rting la chu snyim pa gsum spyi bor blugs so //
T02TD2906E:278b-9: aom su si ti ka ri sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:278b-11: khyim pa yin na spyi gtsug bcing /
T02TD2906E:278b-12: rab byung yin na zhva dang gos gyon /
T02TD2906E:278b-13: de nas nye ba'i dbang po la kha dang lag pa dang rkang pa bshang ba dang gci ba'i lam dang nye ba'i dbang po lnga chus gtor la /
T02TD2906E:278b-14: aom ki li ki li raksha raksha badzra h'um phat ces bya ba zlos shing bsnyen pa'i khang par 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:278b-15: rdo rje rigs la stod g-yogs smad g-yogs sngon po'am /
T02TD2906E:278b-16: dkar po la khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor bzlas te bgo ba dang /
T02TD2906E:278b-17: sangs rgyas spyan bzlas te ze kha bcing ba dang /
T02TD2906E:278b-18: aom badzra kro dha ma h'a ba la ha na da ha ba tsa bidhvan sa ya au tstshushma kro dha h'um phat ces pas rab byung yin na sham thabs bgo'o //
T02TD2906E:278b-19: khyim pa yin na rkang snam bgo'o //
T02TD2906E:278b-20: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2906E:278b-21: na ma: sa manta budh'a n'am h'um dru'm zhes pas cod pan bcing ngo /
T02TD2906E:278b-22: na ma: sa manta bu ddh'a n'am dhim rim rim badzra badzi dza sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:278b-23: zhes pas rdo rje dril bu bzung ngo //
T02TD2906E:278b-25: gos dang khrus dang rgyan dag gis /
T02TD2906E:278b-26: bdag nyid brgyan par mthong nas ni //
T02TD2906E:278b-27: de tshe bsnyen pa'i sgrub po yis //
T02TD2906E:278b-28: las rnams rab tu brtsam bar bya //
T02TD2906E:278b-30: de nas bdag nyid las thams cad pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor du bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2906E:278b-31: na mo ratna ta y'a ya /
T02TD2906E:278b-32: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02TD2906E:278b-33: na mo badzra kro dha ya tadya th'a hu lu hu lu tishtha bandha bandha ha na ha na aa mri te h'um phat ces bya ba dang mtho bong gnyis kyis mthe'u chung mnan te /
T02TD2906E:278b-34: bsnol ba dpung bar gzhag ste /
T02TD2906E:278b-35: snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la h'um bsgoms te spha ra na h'um zhes pas rang dang 'dra ba'i khro bo du ma spros te sems can gyi don byas nas /
T02TD2906E:279a-0: sa ha ra na h'u zhes pas bsdus nas spyan gsum pa stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can klu brgyad kyis @279a * //
T02TD2906E:279a-2: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs par bsams la gnas lngar bsrung bar bya ste /
T02TD2906E:279a-3: rdo rje thal mo las mthe chung gnyis bsnol srin lag gnyis 'khyud gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar mdzub mo gnyis rgyab tu sbyar mthe bong gnyis sbyar la snying gar bzhag pas dpal be'u dang /
T02TD2906E:279a-4: dpral bar bzhag pas mdzod spu dang /
T02TD2906E:279a-7: rkang lag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa bskyed par bya'o /
T02TD2906E:279a-8: de nas mig g-yas pa ma las nyi ma dang g-yon pa ta las zla ba /
T02TD2906E:279a-9: dbus ma dus mtshams kyi me 'dra bar bskyed la /
T02TD2906E:279a-10: mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo'i rtsa bar bkug mthe bong dang gung mo sbyar la /
T02TD2906E:279a-11: aom ru ru spu ru dzva la tishtha siddha aartha ne sv'a ha zhes pas mig byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:279a-13: ai las gyur pa'i mig tu bya /
T02TD2906E:279a-14: mig 'bras h'um las bskal ba'i me //
T02TD2906E:279a-15: de las khro bo'i me byung bas /
T02TD2906E:279a-16: sngags pas sbin dang rlung rnams bsreg / ces gsungs so//
T02TD2906E:279a-17: g-yon pa'i srin lag la sha'i dag byed btags /
T02TD2906E:279a-18: badzra dhrika ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:279a-19: dpral bar tsandan gyi thig le byas rdzi na dzika ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:279a-20: bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i skud pa la mdud pa gsum rgyab la ru dr'aksha rdog gcig pa dang bcas pas aa ro lika ces pa'i sngags bzlas shing dge bsnyen gyi mgul ba dang btsun pa'i dpung bar bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:279a-21: sud pa dmar po gur gum las btsos pa la mdud pa bor la bsngags te /
T02TD2906E:279a-22: aom ha ra ha ra bandha ni shu kra dha ra ni siddha aartha s'a dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:279a-23: zhes bya ba stong bzlas pa rked par bcings na rtag tu khu ba 'gag par 'gyur ro /
T02TD2906E:279a-24: de ltar lus bsrungs nas gnas bsrung ba ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags rings dang spos chus bsang gtor byas pa dang /
T02TD2906E:279a-25: aom k'i li k'i l'a ya badzra bhu ra bandha h'um phat ces bya ba khro bo phur bus phyogs bcur btab nas thal ba dang yungs kar gyis kyang bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:279a-26: de nas steng bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2906E:279a-27: aom su siddha ki ra dza la na aa nanda mu rta ye dzva la dzva la bandha bandha ha na ha na h'um phat ces bya bas rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo dang mdzub mo dang mthe chung gsum bsgrengs te /
T02TD2906E:279a-28: rdo rje'i bla re bsam par bya'o /
T02TD2906E:279a-29: de ltar bla re byas nas ra ba ni /
T02TD2906E:279a-30: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD2906E:279b-0: na mashtsanda badzra @279b p'a na ye /
T02TD2906E:279b-1: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02TD2906E:279b-2: aom sumbha ni su mbha h'um phat /
T02TD2906E:279b-3: aom gri hna gri hna phat /
T02TD2906E:279b-4: aom gri hn'a pa yan gri hn'a pa ya h'um phat /
T02TD2906E:279b-5: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'an bidy'a r'a dz'a ya h'um phat ces bya bas ra ba bya'o //
T02TD2906E:279b-7: sna tshogs rab tu grub par byed pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD2906E:279b-8: bdag nyid sngags dang phyag rgyas bsrung //
T02TD2906E:279b-9: gtsug phud gos dang gtsang byed dang /
T02TD2906E:279b-10: mdud pa bor te bdun gsum bzlas /
T02TD2906E:279b-11: bdag nyid bsrung ba'i phyir bzla'o //
T02TD2906E:279b-12: khang pa kho ra khor yug dang /
T02TD2906E:279b-13: phur bu ra ba bla re dang //
T02TD2906E:279b-14: phur bu bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang //
T02TD2906E:279b-15: khro bo gnyis kyis rtag tu sbyar //
T02TD2906E:279b-16: yang na dpa' bo gcig sngags kyis //
T02TD2906E:279b-17: thams cad sngags kyis bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2906E:279b-18: yang na thal ba nyung kar chus /
T02TD2906E:279b-19: bdag dang gzhan dag bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2906E:279b-20: gsang sngags gsum po zhi ba la'ang /
T02TD2906E:279b-21: sgrub pa po yis nan tan bya //
T02TD2906E:279b-22: phyi rol sa phyogs mi gtsang na //
T02TD2906E:279b-23: rdo rje 'chol ba'i sngags kyis bsrung /
T02TD2906E:279b-24: bdud rtsi thab sbyor khrus kyi tshe //
T02TD2906E:279b-25: zan za'i tshe na badzra dhrika / khro bo 'chol ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD2906E:279b-26: na mo badzra kro dha ma h'a ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bi dhvan sa ya /
T02TD2906E:279b-27: autstshu sma kro dha h'um phat /
T02TD2906E:279b-28: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2906E:279b-30: aom ae ka ta dza la badzra /
T02TD2906E:279b-31: aom sa ma ya manta sma ra h'um phat ces gsungs so //
T02TD2906E:279b-32: rang gi las la bye brag tu //
T02TD2906E:279b-33: bsrung dang spyan drang spyang ba dang //
T02TD2906E:279b-34: phyag rgya bcing dang bzlog gnon dang /
T02TD2906E:279b-35: bskang dang tshim par bya ba dang /
T02TD2906E:279b-36: tshar bcad pa dad bskul ba dang //
T02TD2906E:279b-38: dngos grub kun la thams cad du //
T02TD2906E:279b-39: sgrub pa po yis de dag bya //
T02TD2906E:279b-40: zhes gsungs ba las bsrung ba'i cho ga rim par phye ba ste dang po'o /
T02TD2906E:279b-42: // / gnyis pa spyan drang ba'i cho ga ni rig pa mchog las gsungs pa bzhin ri rab kyi rtsi mor bsams la dkyil 'khor drug gang la mos pa'i lha'i tshogs ri rab kyi steng du bsams la mchod pa rnams dang mchod yon mdun du bzhag la me tog la rdo rje thal mo kha phe ba dang /
T02TD2906E:279b-43: aom ma h'a ma tri bhyungga te sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:279b-44: me tog ma ser mo bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2906E:279b-45: rdo rje thal mo brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis sbyar te /
T02TD2906E:279b-46: aom ka li ta dharma dh'a tu aa nu ga te sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:279b-47: zhes pas bdug pa ma dkar mo bskyed do //
T02TD2906E:279b-48: rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba dang /
T02TD2906E:279b-49: aom bi shuddha gan dhodbha ba ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:279b-50: zhes pas dri chab ma ljang gu bskyed do //
T02TD2906E:280a-1: g-yon pa'i mthe bo dang mdzub mo sbyar la aom tsa le tsu le tsunde sv'a ha /
T02TD2906E:280a-2: zhes pas lha bshos ma mthing ga bskyed do //
T02TD2906E:280a-3: rdo rje thal mo las mthe bo gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sprad la /
T02TD2906E:280a-4: aom d'ipta ta th'a ga ta aa pa ra tsa yar na aa bha ba sa gha nod aa ra dze sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:280a-5: zhes pas mar me ma dmar mo skyed do //
T02TD2906E:280a-6: rdo rje thal mo nyid dang aom tsa le tsu le tsum de ga gnas ma ye sv'a ha //
T02TD2906E:280a-7: zhes bya bas yon chab ma dkar mo bskyed do //
T02TD2906E:280a-8: de nas bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya ste bdag nyid rigs drug gi skur bskyed pa la mtshog mar ni //
T02TD2906E:280a-9: aom las gser mdog bsgyings pa'i sangs rgyas bsgom mo //
T02TD2906E:280a-10: mig gnyis la tsa las gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ser po bsgom mo //
T02TD2906E:280a-11: lkog mar le las mi g-yo ba nag po ral gri dang zhags pa thogs pa bsgom mo //
T02TD2906E:280a-12: lte bar tsu las gtsug gi nor bu mdog dmar po la phyag gnyis pa dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom mo //
T02TD2906E:280a-13: dpung pa gnyis su le las don yod zhags pa ser po bsgom mo /
T02TD2906E:280a-14: snying gar tsu las lha mo tsunda phyag bco brgyad pa dmar mo bsgom mo //
T02TD2906E:280a-15: brla gnyis la sv'a las phyag na rdo rje nag po bsgom mo //
T02TD2906E:280a-16: rkang pa gnyis kyi h'a las ral gcig ma mche ba gtsigs pa nag mo bsgoms par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:280a-17: de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas mchod pa 'bul ba dang phyag 'tshal ba'o //
T02TD2906E:280a-18: lag pa byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2906E:280a-19: lag pa g-yas pa ni 'khor ba /
T02TD2906E:280a-20: g-yon pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa /
T02TD2906E:280a-26: dri med nam mkha' lha bu'i lha mo lnga bsams la phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD2906E:280a-27: dang po rigs drug gi 'khor lo gang rung spyan drang ba'i phyir /
T02TD2906E:280a-28: g-yon brkyang ba bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya las gung mo g-yab cing spyan drang ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD2906E:280a-29: na mo tsu ru kundha tsu ru kundha /
T02TD2906E:280a-30: badzra p'a ni na mo p+h'u ta sye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:280a-32: bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2906E:280a-33: tshur gshegs 'dir ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2906E:280a-34: bdag la mchod pa bzhes nas kyang //
T02TD2906E:280a-35: thugs rjes dgongs shing gnad bar mdzod /
T02TD2906E:280b-0: thal mo sbyar ba bkan pa las mdzub mo gnyis cung zad bkug nas @280b dpral bar gzhag ste /
T02TD2906E:280b-1: aom ta th'a ga todbha ba ye sv'a h'a thal mo legs par sbyar ba la sor mo dbus ma gsum bskyed la padma khya phye ba 'dra ba lkog mar bzhag la /
T02TD2906E:280b-2: aom padmod bha ba ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:280b-3: lag pa gnyis ni rgyab ba bsnol te /
T02TD2906E:280b-4: mthe'u chung ngu dang mthe bo gnyis dkris te rdo rje 'dzin ba'i phyag rgya lte bar bzhag ste /
T02TD2906E:280b-5: badzrod bha ba ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:280b-7: me tog dbul ba'i dbyangs ni// ye shes rgya mtsho rlabs chen gyi /
T02TD2906E:280b-8: sems can kun la byams pa yin //
T02TD2906E:280b-9: stobs chen ye shes me tog gis //
T02TD2906E:280b-10: sangs rgyas bzhin du mchod par shog /
T02TD2906E:280b-11: sbyar ba'i dri yi bsgos pa yis //
T02TD2906E:280b-12: lus la lhag par khyab gyur pa//
T02TD2906E:280b-13: ye shes spos kyi byug pa ni //
T02TD2906E:280b-14: dri bzangs rtag tu 'byung bar shog //
T02TD2906E:280b-15: mkhas pa gang gis dngos po rnams //
T02TD2906E:280b-16: chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs mthong zhing //
T02TD2906E:280b-17: de yi rjes su zhugs pa yi //
T02TD2906E:280b-18: bdug spos kyis ni tshim par shog /
T02TD2906E:280b-19: dngos po thams cad snang byed pa /
T02TD2906E:280b-20: mi shes mun nag la sogs pa //
T02TD2906E:280b-21: bcom nas mar me rab tu gsal //
T02TD2906E:280b-23: lus can kun gyi ji tsam du /
T02TD2906E:280b-24: yid la re ba yongs rdzogs pa //
T02TD2906E:280b-25: byang chub snying por 'dug nas su //
T02TD2906E:280b-26: bdud bcom sangs rgyas rol gyur cig //
T02TD2906E:280b-27: ces bya bas mchod pa dbul lo //
T02TD2906E:280b-29: thog mar byug pa med tog dang //
T02TD2906E:280b-30: bdug spos lha bshos rjes mthun pa /
T02TD2906E:280b-31: tha mar mar me rab sbyar nas //
T02TD2906E:280b-32: khro bo'i rgyal pos bsangs rgyas nas dbul //
T02TD2906E:280b-34: de ltar phyag 'tshal zhing mchod nas sdig pa bzhags pa ni /
T02TD2906E:280b-35: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02TD2906E:280b-36: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni //
T02TD2906E:280b-37: rig sngags gsang sngags tshogs rnams la //
T02TD2906E:280b-38: bdag gis sdig pa ma lus bshags //
T02TD2906E:280b-39: aom sarbba p'a pa di sh na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:280b-40: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02TD2906E:280b-41: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni //
T02TD2906E:280b-42: rig sngags gsang sngags tshogs rnams la //
T02TD2906E:280b-43: dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02TD2906E:280b-44: aom aa nu mo ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:280b-45: bde gshegs padmo rdo rje rigs //
T02TD2906E:280b-46: rdo rje khro bo pho nya dang //
T02TD2906E:280b-47: bka' nyan la sogs pho nya la //
T02TD2906E:280b-48: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul //
T02TD2906E:280b-49: aom dharma tsakra pra brta n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:280b-50: bde gshegs rdo rje padma'i rigs /
T02TD2906E:280b-51: rdo rje khro bo pho nya dang //
T02TD2906E:280b-52: bka' nyan la sogs pho nya la //
T02TD2906E:281a-0: aom aa pa ra nir ba ni ye @281a * //
T02TD2906E:281a-2: sems can phongs pa bskyab pa dang //
T02TD2906E:281a-3: ngan song gsum gyi mgon byas dang //
T02TD2906E:281a-4: dkon mchog gsum gyi rten byin dang //
T02TD2906E:281a-5: 'khor ba'i skyabs bgyi byang chub bsngo //
T02TD2906E:281a-6: aom ku sha la ba ri na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:281a-7: sems can phongs pa bskyab pa dang //
T02TD2906E:281a-8: ngan song gsum gyi mgon byas dang //
T02TD2906E:281a-9: dkon mchog gsum gyi rten byin dang //
T02TD2906E:281a-10: 'khor ba'i skyabs bgyis bdag lus dbul //
T02TD2906E:281a-11: aom a'atma nam nir++ya ta y'a mi sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:281a-12: ngan 'gro rnams las bsgral ba dang //
T02TD2906E:281a-13: nyon mongs rnams las sgrol ba dang //
T02TD2906E:281a-14: srid pa'i mi bde dbugs 'byin dang //
T02TD2906E:281a-15: mya ngan 'das pa'i sems bskyed do //
T02TD2906E:281a-16: aom bodhi tsitta au t+s'a da y'a mi sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:281a-17: ngan 'gro rnams las bsgral ba dang /
T02TD2906E:281a-18: nyon mongs rnams las sgrol ba dang //
T02TD2906E:281a-19: srid pa'i mi bde dbugs 'byin dang //
T02TD2906E:281a-20: mya ngan 'das par skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2906E:281a-21: aom tri sha ra nam gatstsha y'a mi sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:281a-22: sngon gyis rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis //
T02TD2906E:281a-23: smon lam ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin //
T02TD2906E:281a-24: spyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
T02TD2906E:281a-25: bsam gtan shes rab bdag bskyed sho / aom pra ne ta na ye sva h'a /
T02TD2906E:281a-26: de ltar 'khor lo drug spyan drang zhing tshogs bsags nas spyad ba bshad pa ni /
T02TD2906E:281a-27: dang po mchod pa'i yan lag rdzas spyad ba bshad pa ni sngar bstan pa'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod pa'i bgegs bskrad la /
T02TD2906E:281a-28: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags bzlas pa'i spos chu lag mthi le du blugs la rdzas rnams la blta zhing ku sha'i pir thos la aom dzva la dzva la ban du ri h'um phat ces bya ba'i chus bsang ba dang /
T02TD2906E:281a-29: yungs kar gyis brab par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:281a-30: de'i rjes la gnas sbyang ba ni //
T02TD2906E:281a-31: sa gzhi'i dbus su yi ge ram bsams la 'od zer gyi spro bsdu byas pas las dang nyon mongs pa'i sa gzhi sbyangs la /
T02TD2906E:281a-32: de nas stong pa sgyu ma lta bu las /
T02TD2906E:281a-33: yi ge aa gser gyi mdog can bsams la de'i 'od zer 'phro 'du las gser gyi sa gzhi rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa dpangs su dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad yod pa /
T02TD2906E:281a-34: rgyar stong gsum gyi tshad yod pa bsams la /
T02TD2906E:281a-35: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya sa la bzhag nas aom aa tsa le bi ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:281a-36: zhes bya bas sa gzhi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD2906E:281b-0: de nas sa'i lha mo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas phyis 'chad par 'gyur bas kyang byin gyis brlab @281b par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:281b-1: de'i steng du pam las padma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa de'i lte ba la yi ge ba shel dang ba lta bu las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho chen po bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:281b-2: phyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2906E:281b-3: aom bi ma la au da ga dha di h'um zhes bya bas kyang byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:281b-4: de nas yi ge lam las ri rab rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can /
T02TD2906E:281b-5: gser gyi ri bdun dang gling bzhi gling phran brgyad kyis bskor ba /
T02TD2906E:281b-6: de'i steng du bh'um las gzhal yas khang sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor drug gang yang rung ba rnal 'byor pas gang mos pa bsgoms la /
T02TD2906E:281b-7: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am sarba th'a audga te spha ra na hi mam ga na kham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2906E:281b-8: thal mo khong stong du sbyar bas gzhal yas khang byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:281b-9: de nas aom las seng ge'i khri gdan bskyed la /
T02TD2906E:281b-10: de'i steng du pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bskyed de /
T02TD2906E:281b-11: aom ki li ki li sarba badzri bh'u ra pa ndha h'um phat ces bya bas gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa la /
T02TD2906E:281b-12: spos chus lan gsum gyi bar du bsang gtor byas pas gnas dang spyan sbyangs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:281b-13: de nas lha sbyang ba ni /
T02TD2906E:281b-14: dkyil 'khor drug gang la mos pa'i lha dkyil 'khor dang gdan la bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02TD2906E:281b-15: de nas gu gul gyi dud pas bdug cing /
T02TD2906E:281b-16: aom su siddhi ka ra rdzva li ta aa nanda murta ye /
T02TD2906E:281b-17: rdzva la rdzva la bandha bandha /
T02TD2906E:281b-18: ha na ha na h'um phat ces bya bas lha rnams bsang ba dang /
T02TD2906E:281b-19: steng du rdo rje phur bu bcus bgegs bcing ba dang /
T02TD2906E:281b-20: lha rnams sbyangs par yang 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:281b-21: sngar bshad pa'i su siddhi ka ra'i sngags dang /
T02TD2906E:281b-22: gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyis rdo rje bla re dang rdo rje ra ba byas pas kyang gnas dang lha rnams sbyangs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:281b-23: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang pa sa la btsugs la /
T02TD2906E:281b-24: na ma: sa manta bu ddh'a na'm /
T02TD2906E:281b-29: sarba tra aa phra ti ha te /
T02TD2906E:281b-32: ku ru ku ru ta ra ta ra /
T02TD2906E:281b-33: sa manta badzre sa manta badzre /
T02TD2906E:281b-35: ku ru ma ye tu ta ye tu ta ye /
T02TD2906E:281b-38: su si sa manta bi dhva na sa ya dzv l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282a-1: bzlas la sa'i ri mo bdun dang /
T02TD2906E:282a-2: thal ba'i ri mo bdun byas la me 'od kyi phreng ba bsams la mtshams gcad par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:282a-3: de lar sbyang ba'i cho ga gsum pa bstan nas /
T02TD2906E:282a-4: bzhi pa bcing ba'i cho ga bstan pa ni dang por rkang ba rdo rje'i skyil krung ngam /
T02TD2906E:282a-5: sems dpa'i skyel krung bcas la /
T02TD2906E:282a-6: dkyil 'khor drug las gang yang rung ba'i mdun du 'dug ste /
T02TD2906E:282a-7: thal mo sbyar la bstod pa bya ste /
T02TD2906E:282a-8: mgon po thugs rdo che ldan pa //
T02TD2906E:282a-9: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa po //
T02TD2906E:282a-10: bsod nams rgya mtsho yon tan zhing //
T02TD2906E:282a-11: de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2906E:282a-12: dag pa 'dod chags bral ba'i rgyu //
T02TD2906E:282a-13: dge bas ngan song las grol ba //
T02TD2906E:282a-14: gcig ru don dam mchog gyur pa'i //
T02TD2906E:282a-15: zhi gyur chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2906E:282a-16: grol nas grol ba'i lam thob pa //
T02TD2906E:282a-17: bslab pa dag la rab tu gnas //
T02TD2906E:282a-18: zhing gi dam pa yon tan gnas //
T02TD2906E:282a-20: stobs po che la drag shul che //
T02TD2906E:282a-21: rig sngags rgyal po dge ba can //
T02TD2906E:282a-22: gdul dka' ba dag 'dul ba po //
T02TD2906E:282a-24: de ltar phyag 'tshal nas khro bo nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'am /
T02TD2906E:282a-28: pho nya mo bcus bskor ba'am /
T02TD2906E:282a-29: pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhis bskor bar bsams la /
T02TD2906E:282a-30: rdo rje'i rigs kyi ru dral ksha'am /
T02TD2906E:282a-32: aom badzri aa rdzi ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282a-33: zhes pa'i sngags bzlas shing phreng ba bzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha'am /
T02TD2906E:282a-35: sbyin sreg gi lha gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas bsnyen pa'i bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2906E:282a-36: de la dang por khro bo nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i lha'i phyag rgya bcings pa bstan pa ni dbus su rig pa mchog nas 'byung ba bzhin du dbang phug chen po dang /
T02TD2906E:282a-37: au ma'i steng du g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa /
T02TD2906E:282a-38: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa ste /
T02TD2906E:282a-39: sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa /
T02TD2906E:282a-40: de'i g-yas su lha mo m'a ma k'i lag tu rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub 'chang ba /
T02TD2906E:282a-41: sku mdog sngon por bsam pa'o //
T02TD2906E:282a-42: g-yon du bdud rtsi thab sbyor sku mdog dmar po g-yas na ral gri dang dgra sta /
T02TD2906E:282b-0: g-yon na zhags pa dang sdigs @282b mdzub bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:282b-1: gtso bo'i snying po dang phyag rgya ni na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD2906E:282b-2: na ma: tsanda badzra p'a na ye /
T02TD2906E:282b-3: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02TD2906E:282b-4: aom su mbha ni su mbha h'um /
T02TD2906E:282b-5: aom gri hna gri hna h'um /
T02TD2906E:282b-6: aom gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga w'an bidy'a r'a dz'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD2906E:282b-7: phyag rgya ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2906E:282b-8: m'a ma k'i'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje thal mo las mthe bo dang srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung nang du gzhug go //
T02TD2906E:282b-9: sngags ni na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'am /
T02TD2906E:282b-10: tri ta tri ta rdza yanti sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-11: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje thal mo las gung mo gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis rgyab tu lcags kyur byas pa'o //
T02TD2906E:282b-12: sngags ni aom aa mi te ha na ha na /
T02TD2906E:282b-13: bi du na bi du na /
T02TD2906E:282b-14: go pa ya go pa ya /
T02TD2906E:282b-16: aa mri ti a'a tma ka sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-17: na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
T02TD2906E:282b-18: aom rdza ye dza ye ba he sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-21: aom bi dza ye bi kra me tree lo kya bi kra me sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-22: rnam par rgyal ba'i gsang sngags so//
T02TD2906E:282b-23: na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
T02TD2906E:282b-25: rdo rje mchog gi sngags so //
T02TD2906E:282b-26: na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
T02TD2906E:282b-27: aom badzra tstshi nda sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-28: rdo rje rtags kyi sngags so //
T02TD2906E:282b-29: na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
T02TD2906E:282b-30: aom sva ra bi ka bi shu ddhe ratna sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-31: bkra shis kyi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2906E:282b-32: na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
T02TD2906E:282b-33: aom ti dang ku sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-34: shin tu bkra shis kyi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2906E:282b-35: na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
T02TD2906E:282b-36: aom shr'i ba ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-37: padma mtshan gyis gsang sngags so //
T02TD2906E:282b-38: na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
T02TD2906E:282b-41: na mo badzra p'a ni sya aom pra marda ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-42: g-yungs drung gi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2906E:282b-43: na mo badzra p'a ni sya ao bi dhva sa na pra marda ni tstshi nda tstshi nda sv'a h'a mdung rtse gsum pa'i gsang sngags so //
T02TD2906E:282b-44: na mo badzra p'a ni sya aom bi n'a ya ka n'a sha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-46: na mo badzra p'a ni sya sarba sha tr'um pra marda ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-48: na mo badzra p'a ni sya aom aa di sha ya bi kra me sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-49: mdung thung gi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2906E:282b-50: na mo badzra p'a ni sya aom h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-51: klu lag gi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2906E:282b-52: na mo badzra p'a ni sya aom p'a sha ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-54: na mo badzra p'a ni sya aom khadga sv'a h'a ral gri'i gsang sngags so //
T02TD2906E:282b-55: na mo badzra p'a ni sya aom ma h'a dandi sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:282b-57: na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
T02TD2906E:282b-58: aom tsakr'a yu dha ke sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:283a-1: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya las g-yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa ni rgyal ba'i 'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-2: gung mo gnyis gzhibs nas brkyang pa ni rnam par rgyal pa'i 'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-3: srin lag dang gung mo gnyis ka brkyang pa ni rdo rje mtshan gyi'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-4: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya phral nas brang dkyil du bzhag ba ni rdo rje rtags kyi'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-5: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya nyid brang dkyil du bzhag pa ni bkra shis kyi'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-6: lte bar gzhag pa ni shin tu bkra shis kyi'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-7: thal mo kha phye ba 'dra ba ni padma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-8: thal mo kha phye ba padma'i phreng gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-9: khams gsum rnam par rgyal pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bo dang srin lag gnyis bsnol ba ni g-yung drung gi'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-10: rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis brkyang nas mdzub mo gnyis rgyab tu gzhag pa ni mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-11: rdo rje thal mo las srin lag nang du mthe bos mnan pa ni rdo rje'i 'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-12: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi steng du g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bsgreng ba ni mche ba'i'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-13: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ltar lag ngar gnyis rgyab tu sprad la gdung mo gnyis gshibs pa ni mdung thung gi'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-14: lag ngar gnyis rgyab sprad la /
T02TD2906E:283a-15: mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du sbrel la sor mo drug sprul mgo'i gdengs ka ltar brkyang ba ni klu lag gi'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-16: lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad la mthe'u chung mnan pa ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-17: lag ngar gnyis gshibs nas mthe bos mdzub mo mnan sor mo gsum brkyang ba ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-18: lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur gyen du bsgreng ba'i gung mo gnyis brkyang pa ni dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-19: g-yon pa khu bub pa'i steng du g-yas brkyang la kha bub nas gzhag pa ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-20: de ltar phyag rgya bco brgyad bcings nas bzlas par bya ste /
T02TD2906E:283a-21: dkyil 'khor la dgod pa'i thabs bshad pa ni rgyal pa dang /
T02TD2906E:283a-23: rdo rje mtshan ni shar du'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-25: bkra shis dang shin tu bkra shis ni byang du'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-26: padma'i mtshan dang pad phreng dang /
T02TD2906E:283a-27: g-yung drung ris ni lho phyogs su'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-29: rdo rje dang mche ba ni nub phyogs su'o //
T02TD2906E:283a-30: dkyil 'khor gyi nang gi shar du mdung thung /
T02TD2906E:283b-0: nub tu ral gri / byang du @283b zhags pa /
T02TD2906E:283b-1: dbyig pa dang 'khor lo gnyis ni gtso bo'i mdun dang rgyab tu'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-2: g-yas dang g-yon du ni m'a ma ka'i'i rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams pa dang bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro //
T02TD2906E:283b-3: rig pa mchog las m'a ma k'i der bzhag na rig sngags 'grub par the tshom mi bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2906E:283b-4: sngags zlos pa'i tshe rig sngags 'di rnams gdon gang la bya zhe na /
T02TD2906E:283b-5: rgyal bas lha'i gdon rnams so //
T02TD2906E:283b-6: rnam par rgyal bas snying nad skye ba'i dri za'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-7: rdo rje mtshan gyis 'byung po la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-8: rdo rje rtags ni lha ma yin la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-9: bkra shis kyis tshangs pa'i srin po la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-10: shin tu bkra shis kyis gnod sbyin la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-11: padma'i mtshan gyis srin po la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-12: padma phreng gis gzu lums can yugs sa ma'i gdon la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-13: g-yung drung ris kyi bi sa ral bong bu'i gdong can la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-14: rtse gsum pas ni smyo byed la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-17: mdung thung gis brjed byed la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-18: klu lag ni dug skyed pa'i klu la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-19: zhags pa ni nam gru la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-20: ral gri ni bya la bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-21: dbyug pa ni skem byed la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-23: m'a ma k'i'i phyag rgya ni thams cad la'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-24: rdo rje lcags kyu bstan bya zhing //
T02TD2906E:283b-25: rdo rje 'dzin bka' bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD2906E:283b-26: lag na rdo rjes sngags bstan pas //
T02TD2906E:283b-27: gdon rnams thams cad 'jig par byed //
T02TD2906E:283b-28: ces gsungs pas rang phyag na rdo rjer bsgom par nges so //
T02TD2906E:283b-29: rgyal ba stegs bu'i steng du rdo rje rtse gsum pa chang zungs can bri'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-30: de bsams la bzlas pas sa'i gdon gyi pho nya thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
T02TD2906E:283b-31: rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje rtse gsum pa dbyug pa la btsugs pa me 'od 'bar ba bsams la sngags dang phyag rgya bzlas pas tshangs pa'i chu'i gdon gyis mi tshugs so //
T02TD2906E:283b-32: rdo rje mtshan gyi rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsams nas phyag rgya bcings shing bzlas pas lha chen po me'i gdon gyis mi tshugs par bden pa'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-33: rdo rje rtags kyi sngags dang phyag rgya bcings pa log 'dren rnams kyis mi tshugs pas sra ba'o //
T02TD2906E:283b-34: bkra shis kyi sngags dang phyag rgya bcings pas rdo rje sde'i rigs kyi dmyal bas mi tshugs pas brten pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-0: shin tu bkra shis kyi sngags dang phyag rgya bcings pas phur bu gsum pa ste yi dgas kyis mi tshugs pas thogs pa @284a * //
T02TD2906E:284a-2: padma'i mtshan ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ste /
T02TD2906E:284a-3: byol song gi sems kyis mi tshugs pas ma pham pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-4: padma phreng ni dpal chen mo ste mi'i sems skrag par byed pa'o /
T02TD2906E:284a-5: g-yung drung ni tshogs kyi lha rnams te /
T02TD2906E:284a-6: lha dang lha ma yin gyi sems 'jil bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-7: mdung rtse gsum pas ni rdzing gi lha mo ste /
T02TD2906E:284a-8: gnod spyin gyi rigs rnams gcod par byed pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-9: rdo rje ni khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor te /
T02TD2906E:284a-10: srin po rnams gnon par byed pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-11: mche ba ni ma mo rnams kyi ste rang gi las dang nyon mongs pa 'jig par byed pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-12: mdung thung ni smin drug gi bu ka rti ka ste gzhan gyi las 'jig par byed pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-13: klu lag ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho ste /
T02TD2906E:284a-14: bdag gi gdon gza' chen po rnam rlag par byed pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-15: zhags pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba'i ste /
T02TD2906E:284a-16: gzhan ni gdon ma rungs pa'i 'khor lo las thar bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-19: dbyug pa ni sa'i lha mo ste /
T02TD2906E:284a-20: phrin las rnam bzhi byed du 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-21: 'khor lo ni nor lha ste ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-22: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis ni grub pa rnam chud mi za bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-23: rdo rje m'a ma k'is ni 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed pa'o //
T02TD2906E:284a-24: de ltar na lha nyi shu rtsa gcig gi phyag rgya bcing pa bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2906E:284a-25: dkyil 'khor dad po'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcing pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2906E:284a-27: // / dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la mos pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcing ba bshad pa ni bdag nyid cho ga drug gis lhar bskyed nas /
T02TD2906E:284a-28: mdun du snga ma lta bu'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du rdo rje rigs kyi khro bo bzhags pas /
T02TD2906E:284a-29: shar phyogs su khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2906E:284a-30: sngags ni ta tra ta tro ta ya tro ta ya aashta ha sa n'i la badzra su badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:284a-31: lho phyogs su rin chen rigs kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i rin chen h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2906E:284a-32: aom spu ta sphu ta spho ta ya he phu llu ni ru phu llu gri hna ku lu mi li tsu lu ku ru ku lu badzra bi dza y'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:284a-33: nub phyogs su padma'i rigs kyi khro bo rdo rje phur bu chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2906E:284a-34: ghu rna ghurna pa ya ghurn'a pa ya k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:284a-35: byang phyogs su las kyi rigs kyi khro bo rdo rje smyos pa ni las kyi h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2906E:284b-0: @284b sarba sa tva ni dha ya bo dha ya sam bo dha ya sam bo dha ya ka ta ka ta ma ta ra ta ra ta mo ta pra mo ta n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:284b-1: shar lho mtshams kyi phur bu chen po ni bha ma bha ma sam bha ma ya sam sam bha ma ya tstshinda tstshinda bhinda bhinda ma h'a k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:284b-2: lho nub mtshams kyi khro bo phur bu'i sngags ni /
T02TD2906E:284b-3: aom sarba bh'u ta ni kutta kutta sam ku ta ya sam ku ta ya bandha bandha kro dha kro dha k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:284b-4: nub byang mtshams kyi phur bu gtum po'i sngags ni /
T02TD2906E:284b-5: aom sarba sha tr'um gha ta na'n /
T02TD2906E:284b-7: sadgha ta ya sadgha ta ya /
T02TD2906E:284b-8: tsu ru tsu ru tsanda k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:284b-9: byang shar mtshams kyi khro bo rdo rje phur bu'i sngags ni /
T02TD2906E:284b-10: aom sarba bi dy'a badzra badzra /
T02TD2906E:284b-11: t'a sa ya t'a sa ya /
T02TD2906E:284b-12: badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:284b-13: de bzhi'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rje phur pa gzhibs pa ni phur bu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2906E:284b-14: shar phyogs kyi sgo ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sngags ni //
T02TD2906E:284b-16: ha ra ha ra badzra dh'a r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:284b-17: lho'i sgo ba rdo rje rab tu 'jigs pa'i snying po ni /
T02TD2906E:284b-18: aom ka ta ni badzra badzra pra ha ra pra ha ra /
T02TD2906E:284b-19: badzra pra bhanydza n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:284b-20: nub kyi sgo ba rdo rje mgyogs pa'i snying po ni /
T02TD2906E:284b-21: aom ma ta badzra badzra ma ti sthi ra badzra su ti sthi ta badzra pra ti sthi ra badzra ma h'a badzra aa pra ti ha ta badzra /
T02TD2906E:284b-23: ae hi badzra sh'i ghram badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:284b-24: byang phyogs kyi sgo ba rdo rje bsgyur ba'i snying po ni /
T02TD2906E:284b-25: aom ma tha badzra ba dzra dha ri dhi ri dhu ru dhu ru /
T02TD2906E:284b-26: sarba badzra ku lam ae ba rta ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:284b-27: de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang /
T02TD2906E:284b-28: dril bu'i phyag nyid kyis so //
T02TD2906E:284b-29: de ltar sngags dang phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2906E:284b-30: bsgrub pa'i lha ni yi ge h'um las btso bo rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub bsnams pa bskyed la de'i thugs ka'i h'um las khro bo bcu gnyis sprul nas /
T02TD2906E:284b-31: de dang ye shes sems dpa' tha mi dad par gyur pa las /
T02TD2906E:284b-32: sngags dang phyag rgya bcings nas sgrub po zhes phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las gsungs so //
T02TD2906E:284b-33: yang na snga ma'i gnas de'i steng du tra ba ti'i khro bo lnga dang /
T02TD2906E:284b-34: phyogs skyong ba bcud dang bcas pa spyan drangs la /
T02TD2906E:284b-35: dbus kyi gtso bo rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang sngon g-yas pa na rdo rje rtse lnga pa rgya gram phyogs gcig med pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:284b-36: de'i phyag rgya ni thal mo sbyar la /
T02TD2906E:284b-37: de'i phyag rgya ni thal mo sbyar la /
T02TD2906E:285a-0: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya las srin lag @285a * //
T02TD2906E:285a-2: na mo ratna ta y'a ya /
T02TD2906E:285a-3: na ma shtsa nda badzra p'a na ye /
T02TD2906E:285a-4: aom badzra bi dha ra badzra h'um phat /
T02TD2906E:285a-6: byang shar mtshams kyi rdo rje gtum po dmar nag rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phyar te bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2906E:285a-7: phyag rgya ni g-yon pa sdigs mdzub snying gar gzhag la g-yas pa ba ngan gsum pa 'phyar ba dang /
T02TD2906E:285a-8: sngags ni aom ma h'a tsanda h'um phat /
T02TD2906E:285a-9: stobs po che ni rdo rje ka na ya zhes bya ba rdo rje nas 'bras 'dra ba bsnams pa sku mdog nag po'o //
T02TD2906E:285a-10: de'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis snyim pa khong stod du sbyar la sngags ni aom ma h'a ba la h'um phat /
T02TD2906E:285a-11: gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams pa sku mdog ljang ser /
T02TD2906E:285a-12: phyag rgya ni dzambha la'i chu sbyin pa'i phyag rgya nyid gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag ste /
T02TD2906E:285a-13: sngags ni aom aa dzi ta h'um phat /
T02TD2906E:285a-22: steng du tshangs pa dang nyi zla /
T02TD2906E:285a-23: 'og gis sa'i lha rnams kyi 'chad par 'gyur cing sngags dang phyag rgyas bskul ba la bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:285a-24: 'khrul 'khor byed par 'dod na phyis 'chad pa'i khro bo bcu gsum bsams la /
T02TD2906E:285a-25: zhi ba ni gro ga'am ras la 'khrul 'khor bcu gsum pa bris la sngags dang phyag rgyas bskul ba'am /
T02TD2906E:285a-26: rgyas pa ras ser po la bri ba'am /
T02TD2906E:285a-27: dbang la bud med kyi smad sham la bri ba'o //
T02TD2906E:285a-28: mngon spyod kyi dur khrod kyi ras la bri ba dang /
T02TD2906E:285a-29: gi wang ngam gur gum mam mtshal lam dug gis bris la /
T02TD2906E:285a-30: khro bo bcu gsum pa'i sngags dang /
T02TD2906E:285a-32: 'khrul 'khor bri ba ni 'grel pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:285a-33: yang na dkyil 'khor lnga pa pho nya bcus bskor ba'i phyag na rdo rje gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gzhag la /
T02TD2906E:285a-34: phyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcing zhing bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:285a-35: yang na pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba'i skyil 'khor phyis chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas bcing zhing bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:285a-36: de ltar dkyil 'khor drug gi phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga rdzogs so /
T02TD2906E:285a-38: // / lnga pa dkyil 'khor drug gi phyir bzlog pa'i cho ga bshad pa ni phyir bzlog pa lus kyi nyes pa ni lces sngags zos mi dus pa dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-0: lag pas phyag rgya bcing mi nus @285b pa dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-1: rkang pas skyil krung dang stang stabs mi nus pa dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-2: mig gis sku gzugs dang mchod rten dang lha la blta bar mi nus pa dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-3: ngag gi nyes pa rdzun dang phra ma dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-4: ngag 'khyal ba dang tshig rtsub mo la dga' ba dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-5: sems kyi nyes pa bzlas brjod byed pa'i tshe khro ba dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-6: 'dod yon lnga la chags pa che ba dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-7: zhum pa dang mi dga' ba dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-9: rigs sngags zlos pa'i tshe sbrid pa dang lud pa dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-10: gtam gyis bar chod pa'i tshe nye reg byas nas phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD2906E:285b-11: gzhi nas bzlas brjod brtsams na bzlas brjod kyi bgegs dang bar gcod thams cad bzlog cing zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:285b-12: bzlas pa'i phyir bzlog pa bshad nas /
T02TD2906E:285b-13: mchod pa'i phyir bzlog pa ni /
T02TD2906E:285b-14: mchod pa dus gsum du byas na bar chod phyir bzlog go //
T02TD2906E:285b-15: rdzas kyis phyir bzlog pa ni lha la bsngos pa'i snod rnams kyang nyin re bzhin lan re re bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:285b-16: me tog las sogs pa'i rnying pa rnams dus gsum du phyag par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:285b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i glegs bam bklag pa dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-18: mchod rten dang dkyil 'khor dus gsum du byas na bar chad rnams phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:285b-19: slob ma gdul bya'i phyir bzlog pa ni bgegs kyis brlams pa'am /
T02TD2906E:285b-21: lhod pa dang bag med pa dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-23: ma bsdams pa'am mi gtsang bas bzlas brjod byas na bzlas pa grangs su mi gtogs te /
T02TD2906E:285b-24: mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i bzlas brjod dang /
T02TD2906E:285b-26: spyan drang ba'i cho ga bzlas pa ma rdzogs na grangs su mi brtsi bas zlas ba nyi ma gzas zin pa'i tshe /
T02TD2906E:285b-27: sngags stong bzlas na phyir bzlog gi bsnyen par the tshom med do //
T02TD2906E:285b-28: sangs rgyas zhabs kyi bcags pa'i gtsug lag khang ngam mchod rten nam cho 'phrul gyi zla ba la bzlas na bsnyen par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:285b-29: bla ma la sngags kyi gnang ba mnos na yang myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:285b-30: bum pa spos chus bkang ba tra ba ti'i dkyil 'khor lha lnga pa'am /
T02TD2906E:285b-31: bcu gsum pa'i sngags zlos pa'i bum pas dbang bskur na yang phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:286a-0: bum pa ma rnyed na mchod yon gyi snod me @286a * //
T02TD2906E:286a-2: bgegs bsal zhing phyir bzlog pa'i phyir dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:286a-6: mar me ches che ba dang /
T02TD2906E:286a-7: sbyin sreg ches che ba dang /
T02TD2906E:286a-8: sa gzhi byi dor ches khyad par gyur ba byas pas kyang phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:286a-9: bar chad kyi bgegs dang bral na sku gzugs dang mchod rten las 'od 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:286a-10: bkres pa chung ba dang nad las thar pa dang /
T02TD2906E:286a-13: rmi lam bden pa mthong ba dang /
T02TD2906E:286a-14: bzlas brjod la dga' ba dang /
T02TD2906E:286a-18: yon tan lhur len par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:286a-19: bsnyen pa'i phyir bzlog pa'i cho ga rdzogs so /
T02TD2906E:286a-21: // / sta gon dang dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshe /
T02TD2906E:286a-24: bzlas brjod kyi yi ge la lhag chad byung ba dang /
T02TD2906E:286a-25: le lo dang 'dod chags dang g-yeng ba dang bcas pa'i tshe ti lan gdab yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg byas na phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:286a-26: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshe dbang bskur bya ba'i slob ma mtshams med pa lnga dang /
T02TD2906E:286a-27: de dang nye ba lnga dang /
T02TD2906E:286a-28: mi dge ba bcu byas pa'ang thog mar bzlas pa 'bum byas pa yang tha mar sbyin sreg byas na phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:286a-29: ldab phyir bzlog pa bshad nas /
T02TD2906E:286a-30: gsang sngags kyis yongs su bskang ba bshad pa ni yi ge lhag chad byung ba dang /
T02TD2906E:286a-31: rmi lam du byung ngam lhas bstan na de bskang ba'i cho ga ni shog gam gro gal pi wang gis sngags kyi yi ge yangs mor bris la lha la mchod pa chen po byas shing /
T02TD2906E:286a-33: rig sngags kri'i steng du bzhag ste /
T02TD2906E:286a-34: mngon par mchod nas gsol ba btab nas /
T02TD2906E:286a-35: bdag nyid kun sha'i stan la mgo shar phyogs su bstan nas nyal nas rig sngas kyi dbang phyug ma dang /
T02TD2906E:286a-36: bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi shog shog la sngags tshang bar bris pa'am /
T02TD2906E:286a-37: rmi lam du tshang par ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:286a-38: sa bon dang dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshe rdzas kyi lhag ma dang mchod pa dang /
T02TD2906E:286a-40: ma tshang ba bskang bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:286a-41: drug pa bskang pho'i cho ga rdzogs nas /
T02TD2906E:286b-0: lha tshim par bya ba'i @286b cho ga bshad pa ni mchod pa byed pa'i thog mar khrus dang chas byas pas lha mnyes pa dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-1: aa ka ru nag po la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas khyad par can phul bas lha mnyes pa dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-2: til dang zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag brgya phul na lha mnyes pa dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-3: nyin zhag gsum mam lnga'am bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du ba'i 'o ma dang zas mchog dang mar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg brgya phul na mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:286b-4: lha'i mchod pa'i bar du gcod pa'am lha dang 'bral du 'jug pa lha'i bgegs byed pa la mngon spyod kyi phur pas gdab pa dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-5: yungs kar gyis gzir ba dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-6: 'khrul 'khor bris nas snying gar gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-7: nyis ldab pa ma sum ldab tu bskyar na lha mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:286b-8: bsnyen pa'i lha tshim par byed pa bstan nas dkyil 'khor gyi tshe bzlas brjod dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-9: sbyin sreg dang dbang bskur gyis kyang lha rnams mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:286b-10: de ltar mnyes pa bdun pa bstan nas /
T02TD2906E:286b-11: brgyad pa tshar bcad pa ni dkyil 'khor bri ba dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-12: sta gon gyi tshe ri bo'am mtsho'am /
T02TD2906E:286b-18: phug la sogs pa'i gnas su bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang por sa sbyang ba'i cho ga bya'o //
T02TD2906E:286b-19: tsandan dmar pos byugs pa'i seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi la sku dang dmar dkri zhing phur bu'i sngags brgya bzla zhing gdab pa dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-20: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags bzlas la yungs kar gyis bra ba pa dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-21: ba dan dkar po cig la rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas la smyug ma ring po'i rtse mo la btags te shar phyogs su gzugs dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-22: rdo rje re ba bsngags pa'i lcags kyi phye mas ra bya ba dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-23: rdo rje dra ba'i sngags kyis lcags kyi phye ma la brgya bzlas pas ri mo bris nas rdo rje dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:286b-24: dkyil 'khor dang po'i sgor bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i ral gris bsrung ba dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-25: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtse gsum pas bsrung ba dang /
T02TD2906E:286b-26: 'phrog ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad bris pas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:286b-27: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarb'a mu khe bhya: sarba ta th'a ga te bhy'a: kambha /
T02TD2906E:286b-28: badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:286b-30: rdo rje phur bu'i sngags so //
T02TD2906E:287a-1: ta th'a ga ta bhya: sarbba mu khe bhya: sarbba badzra pra kar /
T02TD2906E:287a-2: ta th'a ga ta gha ta dza na ka ku ru ku ru tsa kra na sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:287a-3: rdo rje ra ba'i sngags so //
T02TD2906E:287a-4: na ma sarbba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarbba mu khe bhya: sarbba th'a badzra panydza ra ni kshi pa ka ga na kam sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:287a-5: rdo rje dra ba'i sngags so //
T02TD2906E:287a-6: brgyad pa tshar gcad pa rdzogs so //
T02TD2906E:287a-7: dgu pa bskul ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshe lugs su blugs pa'am bris pa'am /
T02TD2906E:287a-8: brkos pa'am brdungs pa la sogs pa mdun du bzhag la bdag nyid cho ga drug gis lhar bskyed la /
T02TD2906E:287a-9: snying po dang bskul ba'i sngags byar la lha la bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:287a-10: de la lha drug ni 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi dbang du byas nas dang po stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas /
T02TD2906E:287a-11: nam: sarbba ta th'a ga ta nam aom sarbba bi shuddha badzra h'um zhes bya bas snod bcud thams cad stong pa nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:287a-12: don dam pa'i lha ste dang po'o //
T02TD2906E:287a-13: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las kun rd zob kyi snang ba /
T02TD2906E:287a-14: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02TD2906E:287a-15: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um tsandra aa sa na zhes bya bas rig byed kyi sgra'i tshul du rtog bral gyi shes pas sgra brnyan gyi tshul du snang ba gdan bskyed pa ste gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2906E:287a-16: de nas rtogs pa dang bcas pa'i shes pas yi ge h'um kshmi bsams pa ni yig 'bru'i lha ste gsum pa'o //
T02TD2906E:287a-17: h'um las 'od zer phreng ba dang bcas pas spro bsdu byas pa las rdo rje tse lnga pa'i phyag rgya bsam pa ste phyag rgya'i lha sta bzhi pa'o //
T02TD2906E:287a-18: phyag mtshan nas 'od zer 'phro 'du byas pa las sku phyag rgya che na po'i lha na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um /
T02TD2906E:287a-19: tee lo kya bi dza ya h'um zhes bya ba khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgyas rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:287a-20: g-yas pa brkyang ba'i gnas pas dbang phyug chen po dang aum mnan pa /
T02TD2906E:287a-21: rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po stobs po che zhes grags pa 'od zer gyi phreng ba can bsams la m'a ma k'i'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2906E:287a-22: snying gar na ma: sa manta badzra n'am kri ta kri ta kri ta dza yanti sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:287a-23: zhes pas snying gar dpal be'u bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:287a-24: dbral bar sngags dang phyag rgyas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:287a-25: lkog mar sngags dang phyag rgyas tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:287a-26: spyi gtsug tu bzhag nas dbu'i gtsug tor bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:287a-27: rkang pa dang lag pa'i mthil du 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:287b-0: sku phyag rgya chen @287b bo'i lha ste lnga pa'o //
T02TD2906E:287b-1: de nas lha nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bcu gsum pa'am ta ba ti lha lnga pa'am /
T02TD2906E:287b-3: rdo rje pho nya mo bcus bskor ba 'am /
T02TD2906E:287b-4: pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags rig pa mchog gi rgyud dam /
T02TD2906E:287b-5: sna tshogs rab tu grub pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa rnams kyis bskul ba'i sngags dang spel nas bzlas pa bya ste bsnyen pa dang po'o //
T02TD2906E:287b-6: bsnyen pa'i tshe bum pa bskyed nas bum pa la bzlas pa bsnyen pa gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2906E:287b-7: spyin sreg bya zhing sngags dang phyag rgya bcings pa bsnyen pa gsum pa'o //
T02TD2906E:287b-8: ras ris sam sku gzugs bzhag nas sngags dang phyag rgya zlos pa ste bsnyen pa bzhi pa'o //
T02TD2906E:287b-9: zhe ba'i rdzas mar ram 'o ma mdun du bzhag la /
T02TD2906E:287b-10: rgyas pa'i rdzas gi wang ngam sre ta aanydza na la sogs pa gzhag pa'am /
T02TD2906E:287b-11: dbang la mtshal dang tsandan dang gur gum la sogs pa gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2906E:287b-12: mngon spyod la khrag gam zhag gam dug la sogs pa mdun du gzhag la dro ba'am 'bar b'am /
T02TD2906E:287b-13: 'phar ba'am du bar 'thul ba'am rul ba la sogs pa'i rtags byung ba'i bar du sngags dang phyag rgya bcing ba ni bsnyen pa lnga pa'o //
T02TD2906E:287b-14: nad pa la sogs pa thag ring na yang rims dang dug dang nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir nad pa de'i gzugs brnyan byas la sngags dang phyag rgya bcing ba dang /
T02TD2906E:287b-15: rgyas pa la tshe 'phel ba dang /
T02TD2906E:287b-17: nor 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir de'i gzugs brnyan byas la sngags dang phyag rgya bcing ba dang /
T02TD2906E:287b-18: dbang la mi rigs bzhi dbang du bya ba dang /
T02TD2906E:287b-19: lha dang dri za dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang /
T02TD2906E:287b-20: klu dang lha ma yin gyi gzugs brnyan byas la sngags dang /
T02TD2906E:287b-22: mngon spyod la bsad pa dang /
T02TD2906E:287b-23: bskrad pa dang rmugs pa dang /
T02TD2906E:287b-24: rengs par bya ba'i phyir de'i gzugs brnyan byas la sngags dang phyag rgya bcing ba ni bsnyen pa drug pa'o //
T02TD2906E:287b-25: de ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ldang bar 'dod pa'i cho ga bcu gcig bya ste /
T02TD2906E:287b-29: rang dang sgrub pa'i grogs po dang /
T02TD2906E:287b-30: byis pa chung ba la 'di ltar bsrung bar bya ste /
T02TD2906E:287b-37: shu dag rnams la na mo badzra p'a ni sya tsi li tsi li /
T02TD2906E:288a-2: badzra p'a ni ka na sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:288a-3: badzra p'a ni r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:288a-4: de bas na dha r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:288a-5: ri yas'a r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:288a-6: zhes bya ba'i sngags dang sman gyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:288a-10: lha'i bum pa gos kyis dgab ba dang /
T02TD2906E:288a-11: go cha bskon nas ru dr'a ksha gdong gcig pa'am /
T02TD2906E:288a-12: rdo rje 'bru yang lag pa g-yon par bcangs la bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:288a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi ge brgya pa'am /
T02TD2906E:288a-14: rdo rje'i rigs kyi yi ge brgya pa bzlas pas lhag pa dang ma tshang ba bskang bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:288a-15: ldang ba'i tshe mtshan thog thag bsdu ba dang lingga dang sman yang gos kyis dgab par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:288a-16: phreng ba dang sngags dang lha la bcol bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:288a-18: lha mi brjed pas ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:288a-19: bsnyen pa'i cho ga rdzogs so //
T02TD2906E:288a-20: de ltar bsnyen pa zhag bdun nam /
T02TD2906E:288a-21: zla ba gcig gam lo gcig gi bar du bsnyen pa byas las sbyang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gam /
T02TD2906E:288a-22: ras ris sam sku gzugs mdun du bzhag la nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhag bdun nam gsum bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2906E:288a-23: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor byed pa'i tshe sngon du sa'i cho ga bya ba ni skar ma rgyal dang gza' phur bu dang /
T02TD2906E:288a-24: khyim khyu mchog la bab pa'i dus su sa sbyang bar bya ste /
T02TD2906E:288a-25: thog mar bdag nyid bdud rtsi thab sbyor ram h'um mdzad kyi skur bskyed la mandal bya /
T02TD2906E:288a-29: gtor ma bshams las sa'i lha mo spyan drang ba dang /
T02TD2906E:288a-30: 'khor la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:288a-32: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags rings kyis bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:288a-34: pus mo nub tsam du brkos la /
T02TD2906E:288a-35: spos chus sprus pa'i sas bkang ste /
T02TD2906E:288a-36: rdo rje m'a ma k'i'i sngags dang /
T02TD2906E:288a-37: phyag rgyas sman lnga dang rin po che lnga gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:288a-38: sa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas mthon dman dang /
T02TD2906E:288a-41: ngam grog dang rus pa dang sdong dum dang thal ba dan /
T02TD2906E:288a-46: grog sbur la sogs pa de rnams kyi nye bar 'tshe ba spangs te /
T02TD2906E:288a-47: shar dang byang du gzhol ba nye 'khor na chu mod pa /
T02TD2906E:288a-48: khor 'khor yug tu me tog dang 'bras bur ldan pa /
T02TD2906E:288b-0: @288b 'o ma can gyi shing skyes ba zhi ba las dkar po /
T02TD2906E:288b-3: mngon spyod la sa gzhi nag po der sa spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:288b-4: sa gzhi 'thas pa dang khang thog dang rdo leb dang /
T02TD2906E:288b-7: mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gam phur bus gdab pa'i gnas sus gzhi sbyang mi dgos so //
T02TD2906E:288b-8: sa gzud pa ni dang por ba'i rnam lnga dang /
T02TD2906E:288b-9: tsandan dang gla rtsis byugs nas me tog sil ma la sogs pa bkram ste /
T02TD2906E:288b-10: khro bo k'i li k'i l'a ya bzlas pas bsang gtor bya'o //
T02TD2906E:288b-11: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sngags kyis sa sbyang ba dang /
T02TD2906E:288b-12: rdo rje'i rigs la khyad bar du bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis sa gzung ngo //
T02TD2906E:288b-13: sa brtag pa ni ri bo mchog gi dngos grub 'thob po //
T02TD2906E:288b-14: mtsho 'gram du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'thob po //
T02TD2906E:288b-15: dur khrod la sogs par 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'thob po //
T02TD2906E:288b-16: ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten kyi drung du sngags kyi dngos grub 'thob bo //
T02TD2906E:288b-18: nags tshan du gnod sbyin mo 'grub po //
T02TD2906E:288b-19: phug tu mngag gzhug pa rnams 'grub po //
T02TD2906E:288b-20: bsnyen pa'i tshe tshar gcad pa'i cho ga sngar bshad pa bzhin du byas pas ni sa bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:288b-21: de nas rdo rje slob dpon dang /
T02TD2906E:288b-22: sgrub pa'i grogs bos sngar bshar pa bzhin du khrus dang gos dang rgyan btags pa dang /
T02TD2906E:288b-23: mchod pa rnams byin gyis brlab cing snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid cho ga drug gis lhar bskyed la /
T02TD2906E:288b-24: snga ma bzhin du ri rab kyi rtse mor bsams nas /
T02TD2906E:288b-25: rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i phyag rgyas sa'i lha mo spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02TD2906E:288b-26: ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya las gung mo lcags kyus g-yab pa dang /
T02TD2906E:288b-28: tsu ru kunda badzra p'a ni /
T02TD2906E:288b-29: na mo buddh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:288b-30: yom pra ti sa sa bi pa ya ta sanni hi to bha ba zhes brjod cing bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02TD2906E:288b-31: de nas mchod yon dang bcas pa'i mchod pa lngas mchod la /
T02TD2906E:288b-32: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2906E:288b-33: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi //
T02TD2906E:288b-34: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02TD2906E:288b-35: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02TD2906E:288b-36: skyob ba sh'a kya seng ge yis //
T02TD2906E:288b-37: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar //
T02TD2906E:288b-38: de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde //
T02TD2906E:288b-39: pham par byas de dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2906E:288b-40: zhes bya bas dbang du gsol lo //
T02TD2906E:289a-1: phyag rgyas sa la lan gsum reg par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:289a-2: de nas 'khor la gtor ma byin gyis brlab cin bsngos nas /
T02TD2906E:289a-3: sa'i lha mo dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2906E:289a-4: de nas sta gon gyi bgegs nye bar zhi ba'i cho ga byas te ma dang ta ma dang ta las mig gnyis su nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02TD2906E:289a-5: mig 'bras h'um las rdo rje bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:289a-6: rkang mthil du h'um las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la khro bo'i skur bsgoms la /
T02TD2906E:289a-7: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis ngan song sbyong ba nas 'byung ba'i me ltar 'bar ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la de'i rjes la slob dpon gyis khro bo'i bstod pa bya ste /
T02TD2906E:289a-8: chos dbyings stong pa gnyis med dang nyid las //
T02TD2906E:289a-9: 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi spang ste //
T02TD2906E:289a-10: thabs la mkhas pas 'jigs byed skur ston pa //
T02TD2906E:289a-11: khro chen 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2906E:289a-13: dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa //
T02TD2906E:289a-14: zhes pas kyang bka' bsgo ste /
T02TD2906E:289a-15: de rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug che ge mo zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2906E:289a-16: rig sngags 'chang grub pa rgan po dang /
T02TD2906E:289a-17: rgan mo rnams dengs shig ces bya bas bgegs bskrad ba dang /
T02TD2906E:289a-18: h'um h'um 'gro ba 'dzin pa yis ni byas zin gyi //
T02TD2906E:289a-19: h'um h'um gdug pa'i yi can gang yin pha zad song //
T02TD2906E:289a-20: h'um h'um khro bo'i rgyal po sdang mig 'bar ba yis //
T02TD2906E:289a-21: h'um h'um bsregs nas thal ba bzhin du byas sa re //
T02TD2906E:289a-22: zhar phyogs nas ni char chen 'bab //
T02TD2906E:289a-23: me phyogs glo bur snang ba 'byung //
T02TD2906E:289a-25: bden bral sems can la 'jigs bye //
T02TD2906E:289a-26: chu phyogs gshin rje 'brug sgra sgrogs //
T02TD2906E:289a-27: rlung gi phyogs nas tshub ma 'byung //
T02TD2906E:289a-28: gnod sbyin pho mo byang phyogs gnas //
T02TD2906E:289a-29: dbang ldan phyogs nas sna tshogs gzugs //
T02TD2906E:289a-30: steng nas mthu chen lha rnams dang //
T02TD2906E:289a-32: gang dag mtshan mo rgyu ba yi //
T02TD2906E:289a-33: bgegs rnams thams cad 'gro bar gyis //
T02TD2906E:289a-34: zhes bya ba brjod la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags ring gis bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:289a-35: de nas rdo rje'i 'gros kyi bskor ba lan gsum byas la 'greng la thal mo mchog mar gzhag la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2906E:289a-36: sngags ni sngar bshad pas bya'o //
T02TD2906E:289a-37: de nas stang stabs bya ste /
T02TD2906E:289a-38: g-yas brkyang dang g-yon bskyang gis phyogs bzhir bya ba dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-0: thal mo @289b sbyar te rked pa'i gnas su gzhag la /
T02TD2906E:289b-1: rting pa phrad de mig thur la bltas la /
T02TD2906E:289b-2: rdo rje phur bu sred med kyi bus sa 'og rim pa bdun g-yo bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:289b-3: h'um 'brug gi sgra lta bu dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-4: rdo rje gyen du gsor zhing rdo rje gar bskor nas legs par blangs pa'i rdo rje 'phen pa ngag bsdu ba bya'o //
T02TD2906E:289b-5: de nas khro bo dang phyag brnyan dang bran mo dang pho nya mo rnams spro zhing /
T02TD2906E:289b-6: rdo rje be con chogs pa'i g-yas brkyang dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-7: dbyug pa dang mdung thung dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-10: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-11: gtun shing la sogs pa thogs pa'i khro bo bgegs gzhom pa'i stang stabs bya'o / tshangs pa'i gnas man chad gser gyis gzhi yan chad kyi lha dang lha ma yin dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-12: gnod sbyin rnams gcig tu bsdus nas /
T02TD2906E:289b-13: rdo rje me dang rlung gi khro bos bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:289b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su seng ge'i tshul du mchongs nas g-yas brkyang dang g-yon brkang bya ba dang rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rked par bzhag nas lus po 'gul zhing gar bya ba dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-15: rdo rje gsor zhing rkang pa g-yas g-yon sa la gdab pa dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-17: rkang pa brlar gzhag la lus po bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:289b-18: g-yon pa'i rdo rje'i yi khu tshur gyi nang du g-yas pa'i sor mo gsum btsugs pa bton la ral gri shubs nas 'byin pa bzhin du ral gri'i phyag rgyas bgegs bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-19: rkang pa gnyis gshibs la rod rje spyi bo la bskor zhing 'khor lo 'phang ba'i tshul du bya'o //
T02TD2906E:289b-20: rgyas par ni phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-21: mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud phyi ma las blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:289b-22: de ltar stang stabs rdzogs nas /
T02TD2906E:289b-23: lngar bshad pa'i tshar bcad pa'i cho gas kyang 'dir rab dang dra bas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:289b-24: de nas seng ldeng ngam lcags las byas pa'i phur bu stod khro bo smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu bskyed la phur bu'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya zhing dbus dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-26: skud pa dmar po btags pa dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-27: me dog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-28: dri dang gu gul gyi dud pa dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-29: go cha bsgon pa'i bar du phur bu'i cho ga rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:289b-30: de nas dkyil 'khor drug gang yang rung bar byed par 'dod pas bh'um las gzhal yas khang bskyed la ba'i rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2906E:289b-31: tsandan la sogs pa'i dris byugs te /
T02TD2906E:290a-0: dkyil 'khor drug gi lha dang mthun pa'i @290a * //
T02TD2906E:290a-1: so so'i sngags zlos shing dri'i thig le dang /
T02TD2906E:290a-2: me tog gi tshom bu bya'o //
T02TD2906E:290a-3: de nas dkyil 'khor drug gang byed 'dod pa'i lhar bskyed la /
T02TD2906E:290a-4: me tog gi si la ma gtor te /
T02TD2906E:290a-5: sngags dang phyag rgyas sgo phye la /
T02TD2906E:290a-6: sngar gyi bsnyen pa bzhin du spyan drang ba dang /
T02TD2906E:290a-7: sbyang ba dang bcing ba dang /
T02TD2906E:290a-9: lhag pa dang ma tshang ba bskang ba dang /
T02TD2906E:290a-10: lha tshim par bya ba'i phyir mchod pa rgyas pa snga ma bzhin du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:290a-11: de nas bum pa lhag bar gnas pa bya ste /
T02TD2906E:290a-12: rtsa ba nag nog med pa /
T02TD2906E:290a-18: dar gyis mgul ba bcings pa 'dras bu can gyi shing gis kha brgyan pa'i nang du sman lnga dan /
T02TD2906E:290a-22: snying po lda spos chu dang bcas pa bcug la ram las bum pa snga ma'i sngas dang phyag rgyas stong bar bsams la bh'um las gzhal yas khang du bsams la /
T02TD2906E:290a-23: bam las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i steng du aa las byung ba'i zla ba dang padma bsams la de'i steng du lha so so'i sngags kyis lhar bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:290a-24: yod cing 'byor na dkyil 'khor drug gi so so'i lha dang mnyam pa'i bum pa'i steng du las thams cad pa'i bum pa bya ba'am /
T02TD2906E:290a-25: mi 'byor na lnga'am las thams cad pa dang gnyis bya'o //
T02TD2906E:290a-26: de nas sngags dang phyag rgyas sgo phye ste lha spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:290a-27: h'um ye shes bkal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od //
T02TD2906E:290a-28: ma rig 'dod khams bdud rnams thams cad bsreg / zhe sdang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad 'joms //
T02TD2906E:290a-29: log 'dren srin ngo yang dag 'dul pa'o //
T02TD2906E:290a-30: dpa' po chen po dpa' mtshan stag lpags can //
T02TD2906E:290a-31: rigs pa'i rgyal po khro bo bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2906E:290a-32: log 'dren 'joms pa'i slad du spyan 'dren gyis //
T02TD2906E:290a-33: 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2906E:290a-34: ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgyas g-yab cing /
T02TD2906E:290a-37: badzra p'a ni buddha sa sya /
T02TD2906E:290a-38: badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes bya bas spyan drang ngo //
T02TD2906E:290a-39: aom pra bar satk'a ra pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:290a-40: zhes bya bas zhabs bsil dang /
T02TD2906E:290a-41: pu shpa m'a la ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:290a-42: zhes bya bas me tog gi gdan dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:290b-0: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pas lha'i @290b phyi nas 'ongs ba'i bgegs bskrad la /
T02TD2906E:290b-1: phat ma h'a k'a la h'um zhes bya bas sgo bcad de /
T02TD2906E:290b-2: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2906E:290b-3: badzra dhika ces bya ba'i spyi'i snying po yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:290b-4: de nas dkyil 'khor drug gang byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
T02TD2906E:290b-5: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan yang bum pa'i dang du gsal bar dmigs nas sku phyag rgya chen po bsgoms te /
T02TD2906E:290b-6: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD2906E:290b-7: bstod pa dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa dang /
T02TD2906E:290b-8: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyang tshar gcig gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:290b-9: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgud pa dang bral bar gyur cig /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'byor ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par gyur cig ces bya ba'i smon lam gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:290b-10: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba 'khor dang bcas pa yang bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la dbang bskur ba dang khrus bya bar yang gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
T02TD2906E:290b-11: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2906E:290b-12: de nas sbyin sreg lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD2906E:290b-13: zhi ba byed na dkyil 'khor gyi byang shar gyi mtshams su thab khung zlum po sor bzhi phyir dor pa'i kha khyer zlum po dang /
T02TD2906E:290b-14: sor bzhi steng du brtsegs pa'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba dang /
T02TD2906E:290b-15: sor bzhi phyir rol du bskor ba kha khyer la rig pa mchog dang ngan song sbyong ba'i rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin du phyag mtshan bkod de /
T02TD2906E:290b-16: tshon rtsi dkar po byugs te 'o ma can gyi shing la mar dang 'o ma dang /
T02TD2906E:290b-17: sbrang rtsir bcas pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2906E:290b-18: byang phyogs su rgyas pa'i thab khung gru bzhi pa kha khyer sor brgyad pa rim pa gsum dang bcas pa snga ma'i rgyud las 'byung ba bzhin du phyag mtshan bkod de sa ser byugs te /
T02TD2906E:290b-19: zho dang 'bras chan dang bcas pa sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2906E:290b-20: nub phyogs su gzhu lta bu'i thab khung la /
T02TD2906E:290b-21: rgyar khru gang zabs su khru phyed /
T02TD2906E:290b-22: zheng du yang khru phye yod pa /
T02TD2906E:290b-23: kha khyer ni sor bzhi pa rim pa gsum gyis bskor pa /
T02TD2906E:290b-24: rgyud las byung ba bzhin du phyag mtshan bkod la /
T02TD2906E:290b-28: me tog la sogs pas dbang gi sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2906E:291a-1: dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha khyer sum brtsegs dang bcas pa /
T02TD2906E:291a-3: rgyud las 'byung ba bzhin du khro bo'i phyag mtshan bkod la tshon rtsi sngon nag gis byugs la dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang /
T02TD2906E:291a-4: lan tshva la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2906E:291a-5: yang na gru gsum sgo nub tu btod pa'i dkyil 'khor bris la de'i dbus su gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon mthu chen legs par grub pa zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2906E:291a-6: phyogs gcig tu dbyig pa khu tshur rdo rje lcags kyu k'i li k'i la 'jigs byed /
T02TD2906E:291a-12: sgor ni dga' byed gdong dang rdo rje sde dang /
T02TD2906E:291a-14: gru gsum kha ran can la /
T02TD2906E:291a-15: yam shing seng ldeng dang nim pa dang dur khrod las skyes pa dang /
T02TD2906E:291a-16: dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang yungs kar dang gzugs brnyan gyi steng du gnas nas bsreg pa'am /
T02TD2906E:291a-17: mjug tu gzugs brnyan gtub cing bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:291a-18: rdo rje rnam 'joms lam mo bcus bskor ba'i snying po ma bhi zhes bya ba yin par legs par 'grub pa las gsungs so //
T02TD2906E:291a-19: yang na las thams cad pa'i thab khung zhi ba dang mtshungs pa las /
T02TD2906E:291a-20: cung zad kha phyir gyed pa la /
T02TD2906E:291a-21: dkyil 'khor drug gang byed pa'i lha bkod la /
T02TD2906E:291a-22: 'o ma can gyi shing la me sbar la /
T02TD2906E:291a-23: aa las padma'i steng du me lha ser po zhal gcig spyan gsum pa tshangs pa'i gzugs can ril pa spyi blugs dang /
T02TD2906E:291a-24: phreng ba thogs pa mchod phyir thogs dang /
T02TD2906E:291a-25: thal ris gsum pas mtshan pa /
T02TD2906E:291a-26: ra skyes la zhon pa'i me lha bskyed de me sbar nas /
T02TD2906E:291a-27: me lha ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02TD2906E:291a-28: tshur gshegs tshur spyon 'byung po che //
T02TD2906E:291a-29: me yi rgyal po drang srong che //
T02TD2906E:291a-30: sreg blugs zhal zas 'di bzhes la //
T02TD2906E:291a-31: 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2906E:291a-33: skyabs byin gyi phyag las mthe bo srin lag gi drung du gzhag la /
T02TD2906E:291a-34: aagne ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ta /
T02TD2906E:291a-35: de bi ra shi dva dzas sarbo tta ma gri hi tonya\hu ti ma h'a ra sma sa nni hi to bha ba zhes pa'i sngags kyis bzhugs su gsol lo /
T02TD2906E:291a-36: mchod yon dang zhabs bkru ba dang /
T02TD2906E:291a-37: gdan dang sku khrus gsol ba dang /
T02TD2906E:291b-0: me tog dang spos la sogs pas mchod pa dang 'o ma dang nas dang 'bras yos la sogs pas mchod la @291b dgang gzar mar gyis bkang ba dang /
T02TD2906E:291b-1: aagne ha bya ka bya ba ha n'a ya a'a di bya a'a di bya ba ha n'a ya sv'a h'a zhes bya bas dgang blugs dbul lo //
T02TD2906E:291b-2: de nas me brtag par bya ste /
T02TD2906E:291b-3: du ba med cing gser gyi mdog ltar gdangs //
T02TD2906E:291b-4: rab tu che la me lce g-yas su 'khyil //
T02TD2906E:291b-5: kha dog 'ja' 'dra yang na dkar yang rung//
T02TD2906E:291b-6: yang na byi ru bcag pa'i kha dog 'dra //
T02TD2906E:291b-7: shing tu snum la me lce 'gab nas 'phro //
T02TD2906E:291b-8: rab tu 'bar ba nyi ma'i 'dod dang 'dra //
T02TD2906E:291b-9: dbyibs ni bum pa rgyal mtshan gdugs dang 'dra //
T02TD2906E:291b-10: dpal be'u dung dang padma blugs gzar 'dra //
T02TD2906E:291b-11: me lce tri sh'ul rdo rje ral gri 'dra //
T02TD2906E:291b-12: yang na shing rta mchog dang rnga yab 'dra /
T02TD2906E:291b-13: sgra dang ga da rdza rnga gling bu'i sgra //
T02TD2906E:291b-14: du ba me lce dri zhim me stag bzang //
T02TD2906E:291b-15: yang na mi sbar bar yang 'bar par 'gyur //
T02TD2906E:291b-16: de tshe dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2906E:291b-17: du ba che zhing me stag rgod pa dang //
T02TD2906E:291b-18: 'bar ba dka' zhing cung zad cung zad 'bar //
T02TD2906E:291b-19: me lce rnam par 'chad cing gzi mdangs med //
T02TD2906E:291b-20: rtsub nag sprin dang p'a la sha yi ma dog //
T02TD2906E:291b-21: gsal shing dang 'dra zhib ma'i gzugs kyang 'dra //
T02TD2906E:291b-22: phyugs kyi mgo 'dra sgra yang rab tu rtsub //
T02TD2906E:291b-23: me lce 'phro bas sbyin sreg byed pa'i mchog //
T02TD2906E:291b-24: mi ro'i dri ri dngos grub med par ston //
T02TD2906E:291b-25: me yi mtshan ma 'di dag mthong nas ni //
T02TD2906E:291b-26: stobs po che yi mar gyis sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2906E:291b-27: de nas til dang nas zho dang 'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas la me lha la bstod do //
T02TD2906E:291b-28: me lha'i thugs kar dkyil 'khor drug gang yang rung ba'i lha bkod do /
T02TD2906E:291b-29: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bsreg rdzas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:291b-30: de nas me lha'i thugs ka'i ye shes sems pa'i dkyil 'khor du phyir bzhugs su gsol la /
T02TD2906E:291b-32: me lha'i dam tshig sems dpa' me tha mal ba la thim par bsam mo //
T02TD2906E:291b-33: sbyin sreg sta gon du gnas pa'o //
T02TD2906E:291b-34: gtor ma sta gon du gnas pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis gtor ma bsangs la /
T02TD2906E:291b-35: khro bo 'tshal ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas /
T02TD2906E:291b-36: sangs rgyas spyan dang nam mkha' mdzod kyis sbel te /
T02TD2906E:291b-37: kha 'bar ma'i sngags kyis bsdos la /
T02TD2906E:291b-38: dpung bzangs kyis zhugs pa'i rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin du gdon rnams la sngon du mchod pa phyogs skyong ba rnams la phyis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:292a-1: ni dbang ldan la ru dr'a ya sv'a d'a /
T02TD2906E:292a-2: dbang po la sha kr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:292a-3: me lha la aagne ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:292a-4: gshin rje la be ba s'a dha ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:292a-5: bden bral la r'aksha s'a dhi pa ta ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:292a-6: chu lha la ru n'a ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:292a-7: rlung lha la b'a ya be sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:292a-8: ku be ra la yaksha siddha resv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:292a-9: srin po la kra ke ri sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:292a-10: sha za la mi tsi mi tsi /
T02TD2906E:292a-12: gdon rnams kyi ni sarbba de ba n'a ga yaksha raksha s'a aa su ra kinna ra ma ho ra ga ma tri ga na pi sh'a tsi /
T02TD2906E:292a-14: aa pa sma ra ka ta p'u ta na /
T02TD2906E:292a-16: dzva la tishtha siddhi lo tsa na sarbba aartha s'a dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:292a-17: zhes pas bsngos la gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:292a-18: khyad par gyi 'byung po la gcig sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:292a-19: gtor ma lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02TD2906E:292a-20: de nas sngar bstan pa'i slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa lhag par gnas par 'dod na /
T02TD2906E:292a-21: de nas gshegs pa la mchod yon dang /
T02TD2906E:292a-25: bde gshegs rdo rje'i rigs bdag po //
T02TD2906E:292a-26: rdo rje 'chang ba thugs rje'i bdag //
T02TD2906E:292a-27: bdag la mnyes shing dgyes pa dang //
T02TD2906E:292a-28: byin gyis brlab cing dngos grub stsol //
T02TD2906E:292a-29: zhes gsol ba btab la rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas slob ma dgug pa dang /
T02TD2906E:292a-30: lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang /
T02TD2906E:292a-31: rdo rje ser ba'i phyag rgyas bsdigs pa dang /
T02TD2906E:292a-32: khro be con dang stobs po ches dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02TD2906E:292a-33: de nas snga ma bzhin du bdun rnam dag byas la /
T02TD2906E:292a-34: slob ma khro bo phyag na rdo rje'am bdud rtsi 'khyil par bskyed de /
T02TD2906E:292a-35: yi ge h'um dang rang gi sngags kyi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bsams la /
T02TD2906E:292a-36: m'a ma k'i'i phyag rgyas gnas lngar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2906E:292a-38: kha lan gsum du bkru ba dang /
T02TD2906E:292a-39: srung skud mdud pa gsum pa bcing ba dang /
T02TD2906E:292a-40: ku sha byin nas rmi lam brtag pa dang /
T02TD2906E:292a-42: gzi brjid phung po bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2906E:292a-43: byams pa'i sngags kyis go cha bskon pa dang /
T02TD2906E:292a-44: h'um bzhi pa'i sngags dang bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis bsrungs ba dang /
T02TD2906E:292a-45: spos chus brlan pa'i lag pa mgo la gzhag la rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan bdun bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2906E:292a-46: de nas slob ma la zab cing rgya che ba'i chos bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:292a-47: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02TD2906E:292a-48: de nas snyan gsan dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2906E:292b-0: lha rnams @292b kun la gsan par gsol //
T02TD2906E:292b-2: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni brtse bar gyur nas su //
T02TD2906E:292b-3: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD2906E:292b-4: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2906E:292b-6: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa lags //
T02TD2906E:292b-7: de bas gnang bar mdzad par rigs //
T02TD2906E:292b-8: sangs rgyas mgon po brtser ldan dang //
T02TD2906E:292b-9: byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang //
T02TD2906E:292b-10: gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang //
T02TD2906E:292b-11: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD2906E:292b-12: gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang //
T02TD2906E:292b-13: gang yang lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i //
T02TD2906E:292b-14: sangs rgyas bstan la dga' ba rnams //
T02TD2906E:292b-15: bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2906E:292b-16: bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes bgyi //
T02TD2906E:292b-17: sang ni gdugs la dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2906E:292b-18: bzang po ming ni 'di zhes bgyi //
T02TD2906E:292b-20: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02TD2906E:292b-21: thugs ni brtse bar dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2906E:292b-22: tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2906E:292b-23: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2906E:292b-26: sta gon gyi lha gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2906E:292b-27: sta gon gyi cho ga bsgrub pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2906E:292b-29: // / sgrub pa chen po dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas /
T02TD2906E:292b-30: slob dpon dang slob ma ku sha'i stan dang sngas la nyal nas /
T02TD2906E:292b-31: nang par slob ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor byas te /
T02TD2906E:292b-32: slob ma la rmi lam ci mthong zhes kyang dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:292b-33: sangs rgyas dang mchod rten dang sku gzugs la sogs pa mthong na dge'o //
T02TD2906E:292b-34: phyag na rdo rje kun nas btus pa las 'byung ba bzhin du rmi lam brtags nas /
T02TD2906E:292b-35: rmi lam mi shis na gtor ma dang sbyin sreg la sogs bya'o //
T02TD2906E:292b-36: nang par sngar bshad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gos dkar po gon nas //
T02TD2906E:292b-37: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags zlos shing /
T02TD2906E:292b-38: tshon sna lnga'i srad bus rab gtsang ma mdzes pa /
T02TD2906E:292b-39: shin tu ran pa dri zhim pa reg na bde ba /
T02TD2906E:292b-40: legs par bkal ba sra ba sbom phra med pa /
T02TD2906E:292b-41: 'jur mdud med pa'i thig skud la /
T02TD2906E:292b-42: dkar po la ram chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin //
T02TD2906E:292b-43: dmar po la kam gser thub kyi rang bzhin /
T02TD2906E:292b-44: ser po la aam thub pa byang chub snying po'i rang bzhin /
T02TD2906E:293a-0: ljang gu la pam phyag na rdo rje'i @293a * //
T02TD2906E:293a-2: sngon po la h'um khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rang bzhin du bskyed la /
T02TD2906E:293a-3: aom badzra sa ma ya m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bya bas bzlas la /
T02TD2906E:293a-4: mchod pa sngas mchod nas thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:293a-5: thig gi cho ga ni thun mong gi cho ga las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:293a-6: srad bu chad na bla ma 'chi //
T02TD2906E:293a-9: ltas ngan byung na dngos mi 'grub //
T02TD2906E:293a-11: de nas ba'i rnam lngas sa gzhi khor khor yug tu chag chag btab la byugs te /
T02TD2906E:293a-12: byung na rin po che'i phye ma'am /
T02TD2906E:293a-13: s'a lu'i phye ma'am sa'i phye mas bya'o //
T02TD2906E:293a-14: de nas tshon rtsi la aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2906E:293a-15: rig sngags kyi rgyal po phyag na rdo rje'i sngags kyis bsang gtor bya /
T02TD2906E:293a-17: dang po gzugs su bri bar bshad //
T02TD2906E:293a-18: gnyis pa dag ni phyag rgyar bshad //
T02TD2906E:293a-19: gsum pa stan dang gnas dag dang //
T02TD2906E:293a-20: yig 'bru bri bar rab tu bsngags pa /
T02TD2906E:293a-21: de la dkyil 'khor dang po lha nyi shu rtsa gcig pa dgod do //
T02TD2906E:293a-22: dbus kyi lte ba rtsibs lnga pa la dbus su bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje sngar bshad pa bzhin du bri ba dang /
