T02TD2906E:293a-25: g-yon du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste /
T02TD2906E:293a-26: m'a ma k'i'i rtags rdo rje rtse gsum pa /
T02TD2906E:293a-27: byang du rdo rje rtse gsum pa dbyug pa la btsugs pa//
T02TD2906E:293a-28: dbus su rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis chang zungs drang por 'dug la /
T02TD2906E:293a-29: chang zungs kyi lte ba la dgra sta srab mo kha phyir bltas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:293a-30: mdun du skem byed kyi dbyig pa /
T02TD2906E:293a-32: rdo rje rtse gsum pas bskor ba /
T02TD2906E:293a-33: de'i phyi rol gyi rtsibs bcu gnyis la /
T02TD2906E:293a-34: shar du rgyal ba'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa /
T02TD2906E:293a-35: rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa me lce 'phro ba /
T02TD2906E:293a-36: rdo rje mtshan gyi rdo rje rtse gsum pa shar du dgod do //
T02TD2906E:293a-37: byang du rdo rje rtags kyi rdo rje rtse gsum pa /
T02TD2906E:293a-38: bkra shis kyi rdo rje rtse gcig pa /
T02TD2906E:293a-39: shin tu bkra shis kyi rdo rje rtse gsum pa padmas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2906E:293a-40: lhor padma'i mtshan gyi padma'i sdong bu kha cung zad bye ba rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2906E:293a-41: padma phreng gi padma'i sdong bu kha bye ba dbus na rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2906E:293a-42: nub tu g-yung drung ris kyi ni gru bzhi bsnol ba'i dbus su g-yung drung 'khyil pa'i rtse mor shing thog skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu rin pho ches mtshan pa'o /
T02TD2906E:293b-1: rdo rje ni kha gnyis rdo rje'i rva dbus ma nas 'bras kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa'o /
T02TD2906E:293b-2: mche ba ni padma'i sdong bu la che ba gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2906E:293b-3: nang gi sgo bzhir mdud rtse gcig pa dang /
T02TD2906E:293b-4: sbrul gyi zhags pa me lce dang bcas pa rdo rje gsum pas mtshan pa dang /
T02TD2906E:293b-5: mdung rtse gsum pa sbrul gyi zhags pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2906E:293b-7: panytsa r'a ga'i rtsig pa dang /
T02TD2906E:293b-9: rin po che'i mda' yab dang /
T02TD2906E:293b-13: rod rje ra ba me 'od dang bcas pa bri'o //
T02TD2906E:293b-14: dgod pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02TD2906E:293b-15: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ni sngar bshad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya rgyas dbus su rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog sngon po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:293b-16: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02TD2906E:293b-17: rig pa mchog las gsungs pa bzhin bsam par bya'o//
T02TD2906E:293b-18: shar gyi khro bo dkar po rdo rje dang sdig mdzub /
T02TD2906E:293b-19: lho'i khro bo ser po rin po che dang sdigs mdzub /
T02TD2906E:293b-20: nub kyi khro bo dmar po padma dang sdigs mdzub /
T02TD2906E:293b-21: byang gi khro bo ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub mdzub pa'o //
T02TD2906E:293b-22: mtshams bzhi'i sku mdog nag po'o //
T02TD2906E:293b-23: shar lhor rdo rje'i phur bu bsams pa'o //
T02TD2906E:293b-24: lho nub tu rin po che'i phur bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2906E:293b-25: nub byang du padma'i phur bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2906E:293b-26: byang shar du sna tshogs rdo rje'i phur bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2906E:293b-31: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2906E:293b-32: lnga lnga pa ni sku mdog dang phyag /
T02TD2906E:293b-33: mtshan snga ma bzhin du bkod la //
T02TD2906E:293b-34: phyogs skyong ba bcu yang sta gon gyi gtor ma'i sngags dang /
T02TD2906E:293b-35: rdo rje bsnams pa las gung mo myu gu ltar gshibs te /
T02TD2906E:293b-37: mthe'u chung so sor bsgreng la spyi'i phyag rgyas dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:293b-38: dkyil 'khor bzhi pa 'khrul 'khor yang khro bor bskyed pa'i tshe dbus kyi gtso bo rdo rje'i 'dzin pa sku mdog sngon po /
T02TD2906E:293b-39: g-yas rdo rje g-yon pa sdigs mdzub /
T02TD2906E:293b-40: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:293b-41: dbang phyug chen po khyo shug mnan pa'o //
T02TD2906E:293b-42: thams cad kyang sku mdog nag po'o //
T02TD2906E:293b-43: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs man bsab /
T02TD2906E:294a-0: @294a * // shar du rdo rje be con /
T02TD2906E:294a-1: lhor rdo rje 'chol pa rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-2: nub tu rdo rje tho ba /
T02TD2906E:294a-3: byang du rdo rje lcags kyu /
T02TD2906E:294a-4: shar lhor rdo rje lcags sgrog / lho nub tu rdo rje ser ba /
T02TD2906E:294a-5: nub byang du rdo rje gnod mdzes /
T02TD2906E:294a-6: byang shar du rdo rje rmongs byed /
T02TD2906E:294a-7: shar sgor rdo rje stobs po che /
T02TD2906E:294a-8: lho sgor rdo rje bzhad pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-9: nub sgor rdo rjes seng ge'i gdan /
T02TD2906E:294a-10: byang sgor rdo rje gtum po /
T02TD2906E:294a-11: ya sos ma mchu mnan pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-12: skra dang smar 'bar ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:294a-13: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2906E:294a-14: yang rdo rje pho nya mo bcus bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor ni dbus su rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa snga ma bzhin du bris la /
T02TD2906E:294a-15: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'i rtsibs dang po blo gros rdo rje ma rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-16: gnyis pa rdo rje rde dril bu bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-17: gsum pa rdo rje nag mo rdo rje nag mo rdo rje gsum pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-18: bzhi pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa be con bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-19: lnga pa rdo rje rol pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-20: drug pa rdo rje ska rags rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-21: bdun pa rdo rje shugs mda' gzhu bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-22: brgyad pa rdo rje nyi ma rdo rje 'bar ba bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-23: dgu pa rdo rje dbyig pa rdo rje dbyug thob bsnams pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-24: bcu pa rdo rje bden pa sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2906E:294a-25: de sgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya las srin lag nang du bcug la /
T02TD2906E:294a-26: nam: sa manta bu ddha badzra n'a ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02TD2906E:294a-27: ces bya bar bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:294a-28: yang na rdo rje nyid bstod de /
T02TD2906E:294a-29: bstan pa ni pho nya mo rnams kyi ste /
T02TD2906E:294a-30: na mo ranta tra y'a ya /
T02TD2906E:294a-31: na mo badzra dha ra pra na ma bi dy'a ga na sye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2906E:294a-33: rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor la shar phyogs su rdo rje rigs kyi dang po rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02TD2906E:294a-35: gsum pa rdo rje rgyal ba /
T02TD2906E:294a-36: rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba /
T02TD2906E:294a-47: rdo rje snying po'i rgyal po /
T02TD2906E:294a-48: rdo rje 'jigs byed rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:294a-49: lhor rin po che'i rigs rdo rje'i ske rags /
T02TD2906E:294a-52: rdo rje yangs pa chen mo /
T02TD2906E:294a-55: rdo rjed dga' ba nye dga'/
T02TD2906E:294b-0: rdo rje dka' thub zlog / rdo rje @294b dbyig pa /
T02TD2906E:294b-4: khro bo k'i li k'i l'a ya /
T02TD2906E:294b-5: khor bo su ru su ru /
T02TD2906E:294b-23: rdo rje thog thog rnams bri par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:294b-24: byang phyogs su las kyi rigs rdo rje dbyig pa /
T02TD2906E:294b-34: rdo rje mtshon cha'i snying po /
T02TD2906E:294b-39: rdo rje 'jigs byed rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:294b-40: rdo rje pho nya mo de rnams bri ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni sngar bstan pa'i spyi'i de nyid kyis bya'o //
T02TD2906E:294b-41: de ltar dkyil 'khor drug bris nas /
T02TD2906E:294b-43: ba dan bzhi gur gum dang rgya skyegs las btsos pa shing ring bzhi'i rtse mo la btags pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdzas dang /
T02TD2906E:294b-44: phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur pa'i rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin du bsrung ba'i yan lag phyogs bzhir mdo bzhi bklag pa dang /
T02TD2906E:294b-45: mda' bcu dang phur bu gdab pa dang /
T02TD2906E:294b-48: sngar bshad pa bzhin du bsrung ba'i yan lag rnams dang /
T02TD2906E:294b-49: mchod pa'i rdzas thams cad dang /
T02TD2906E:294b-50: bum pa dang sbyin sreg dang /
T02TD2906E:294b-51: gtor ma'i rdzas thams cad bsags la rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid sngar bzhin du khrus dang gos bgo ba byas nas /
T02TD2906E:294b-52: cho ga drug gi lhar bskyed de //
T02TD2906E:294b-53: srung ba dang spyan drang sbyang ba dang /
T02TD2906E:294b-54: phyag rgya bcing dang phyir bzlog gnon //
T02TD2906E:294b-55: bskang dang tshim par bya ba dang //
T02TD2906E:294b-56: tshar gcod pa dang bskul ba dang //
T02TD2906E:294b-58: zhes bshad pa'i cho ga bcu gnyis 'dir yang thams cad rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2906E:295a-0: bdag nyid dngos grub bsgrub pa'am slob ma dbang bskur ba'i phyir cho ga thams cad spyad @295a * //
T02TD2906E:295a-2: de ltar bsnyen pa'i tshe don bcu gnyis ji ltar byas pa bzhin du nye ba'i bsnyen pa la yang de bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2906E:295a-3: sgrub pa sta gon la yang de bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2906E:295a-4: sgrub pa chen po dkyil 'khor zhag kyang bcu gnyis snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2906E:295a-5: de nas dkyil 'khor drug gang yang rung ba la /
T02TD2906E:295a-6: slob ma dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2906E:295a-7: de la dbang por phyi'i 'jug pa ni sems rab tu dang ba'i slob ma snga bzhin du phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02TD2906E:295a-10: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD2906E:295a-11: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa bdun rnam dag byas la ;
T02TD2906E:295a-12: sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02TD2906E:295a-13: smad g-yogs dang gdong g-yogs bskon la dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sngags dang phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas sngags lan gsum bzlas nas /
T02TD2906E:295a-14: lha'i rigs kyi bsod nams ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:295a-15: des dkyil 'khor du dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:295a-16: de nas rdo rje rigs kyi sngags bzlas la me tog 'phangs la gang la phog pa'i lha de ni de'i rigs kyi lhar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:295a-17: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'khor bstan de /
T02TD2906E:295a-19: da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed //
T02TD2906E:295a-20: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2906E:295a-21: sngags dang rig pas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2906E:295a-22: 'byor pa thams cad mngon du gyur /
T02TD2906E:295a-23: rten dang dngos grub thams cad kyang //
T02TD2906E:295a-24: khyod la mngon du phyogs 'gyur gyi //
T02TD2906E:295a-25: dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig srungs //
T02TD2906E:295a-27: de'i tshe me tog dbu la phog na mchog gi dngos grub 'thob /
T02TD2906E:295a-28: me tog rked pa la phob na thun mong gi dngos grub 'thob /
T02TD2906E:295a-29: me tog rkang pa la phog na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:295a-31: nas dang sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma la sogs pa zhib pa'am /
T02TD2906E:295a-33: mngon spyod kyis bgegs bzlog pas dbang bskur ba'i 'os 'gyur ro //
T02TD2906E:295a-34: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i rten sar pa la bzhag nas /
T02TD2906E:295a-35: sgrub pa'i grogs pos bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i 'di skad gdon par bya ste /
T02TD2906E:295b-0: gang la ser sna rnam @295b chags pa //
T02TD2906E:295b-1: rnam bcom dri ma sel mdzad cing //
T02TD2906E:295b-2: thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des //
T02TD2906E:295b-3: khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog //
T02TD2906E:295b-5: thar ba'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing //
T02TD2906E:295b-6: chos rnams thams ston pa des //
T02TD2906E:295b-7: khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog //
T02TD2906E:295b-8: ston pa bzhugs pa rnams kyi rten //
T02TD2906E:295b-9: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2906E:295b-10: gang gi bde ba mnga' mdzad des //
T02TD2906E:295b-11: khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog //
T02TD2906E:295b-12: skyo pa gang gis byams pa yi //
T02TD2906E:295b-14: bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des //
T02TD2906E:295b-15: khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog /
T02TD2906E:295b-17: sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing //
T02TD2906E:295b-18: gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa ste //
T02TD2906E:295b-19: khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog //
T02TD2906E:295b-20: gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur //
T02TD2906E:295b-21: gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la //
T02TD2906E:295b-22: gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa ste //
T02TD2906E:295b-23: khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog //
T02TD2906E:295b-24: dpa' bo chen po gar skyes par //
T02TD2906E:295b-25: phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing //
T02TD2906E:295b-26: don grub tshogs kyang grub pa ste //
T02TD2906E:295b-27: khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog //
T02TD2906E:295b-28: gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni //
T02TD2906E:295b-29: nags tshal tshal bcas par rab g-yos shing //
T02TD2906E:295b-30: sems can thams cad rab dga' phyed //
T02TD2906E:295b-31: khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog / byang chub snying po gang zhig gis //
T02TD2906E:295b-32: sa dag rnam drug g-yos gyur cing //
T02TD2906E:295b-33: bdud yid mi bder gyur pa ste //
T02TD2906E:295b-34: khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog //
T02TD2906E:295b-35: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na //
T02TD2906E:295b-36: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba //
T02TD2906E:295b-37: thub pa'i bstan pa gang byung ste //
T02TD2906E:295b-38: khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog //
T02TD2906E:295b-39: sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad //
T02TD2906E:295b-40: brgya byin bcas pa'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD2906E:295b-41: 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni //
T02TD2906E:295b-42: khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig //
T02TD2906E:295b-43: sangs rgyas bsod rnams mthu dag dang //
T02TD2906E:295b-44: lha rnams kyi ni bsams pa yis //
T02TD2906E:295b-45: khyod kyi 'dod don gang yin pa //
T02TD2906E:295b-47: rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog //
T02TD2906E:295b-48: rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog //
T02TD2906E:295b-49: khyed can lam 'gro ba de legs gyur //
T02TD2906E:295b-50: phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs gyur //
T02TD2906E:295b-51: nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs //
T02TD2906E:296a-1: bde legs shog / khyed cag kun tu bde legs 'gyur //
T02TD2906E:296a-2: khyed cag sdig bar ma gyur cig / ces bkra shis brjod nas /
T02TD2906E:296a-3: cho ga drug gis ltar bskyed nas gnas lngar byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil 'khor gyi sngags bzlas ba'i gdugs bteg la khro bo gnod mdzes kyi sngags bzlas pa'i bdug pas bdug cing rnga yab kis g-yab la glu dang sil snyan dang /
T02TD2906E:296a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi lha kun la gsol ba btab la /
T02TD2906E:296a-6: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sngags btab pa'i bum bas lan gsum bskor ba byed du bcug la chu'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:296a-7: de nas phyag rgya bcing ba dang /
T02TD2906E:296a-8: sngags bzlas pas spyi bor gtug par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:296a-9: de nas gos sar ba bskon nas cos pan dang rgyan btags pa dang /
T02TD2906E:296a-10: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi phyag mtshan g-yas pa g-yas par sbyin /
T02TD2906E:296a-11: g-yon pa g-yon par byin la /
T02TD2906E:296a-12: de nas slob dpon gyis me tog gi phreng ba spyi bor bzhag la ming gdags par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:296a-13: de nas seng ge'i khri la bzhag la /
T02TD2906E:296a-14: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bsgrengs nas /
T02TD2906E:296a-15: rin po che sna bdun dang bkra shis rdzas brgyad dang lha rnams kyi phyag mtshan dang bcas pa byin la /
T02TD2906E:296a-16: rang rang gi ming dang lung bstan pa dang /
T02TD2906E:296a-19: de nas sngags kyi gnang ba gi wang ngam gru gum gyis yi ge bris la slob ma dang slob dpon mnyam du lan bdun gyi bar du bklags par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:296a-20: des sngags kyi gnang ba thob par 'gur ro //
T02TD2906E:296a-21: dkyil 'khor mthong nas dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te /
T02TD2906E:296a-22: slob dpon go 'phang thob pa'i phyir /
T02TD2906E:296a-23: dang po'i dbang du bsgrags pa yin //
T02TD2906E:296a-24: rig sngags thams cad grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2906E:296a-25: gnyis pa'i dbang du bshad pa yin /
T02TD2906E:296a-26: bgegs ni rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02TD2906E:296a-27: gsum pa rab tu bsgrags pa yin //
T02TD2906E:296a-28: zhi pa sbyor ba thob pa'i phyir /
T02TD2906E:296a-29: cho ga bzang po de bshad do //
T02TD2906E:296a-31: bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang po'o //
T02TD2906E:296a-32: rig sngags bzlas pa gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2906E:296a-33: bgegs rnams zhi ba gsum ba'o //
T02TD2906E:296a-36: ngan song gsum du mi lhung ba dang /
T02TD2906E:296b-0: mi @296b khom pa brgyad spangs pa dang //
T02TD2906E:296b-1: tshe rabs dran zhing longs spyod che //
T02TD2906E:296b-2: tshul khrims ldan zhing gzugs kyang bzang //
T02TD2906E:296b-3: rtag tu mi dang lha rnams kyi //
T02TD2906E:296b-4: mtho ris gnas su skye bar shog /
T02TD2906E:296b-5: ces smon lam yang gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:296b-6: gal te sdom pa 'dzin par mi nus pa'am /
T02TD2906E:296b-7: nad pa'am bar chad mang du 'byung ba'am /
T02TD2906E:296b-9: rig pa mchog las gsungs pa'i gdon rnams kyis gtses pa la khrus kyi cho ga bya ste /
T02TD2906E:296b-10: bdud rtse'i 'khyil par bskyed la gnas lngar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2906E:296b-11: lha rnams kyi sngags zlos shing yungs kar gyi sa brab pa dang /
T02TD2906E:296b-12: rma bya'i sgro'i dbus su phyag rgya bcings pa ni bin du pa la zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor gyi sngags zlos shing bya ba pa dang /
T02TD2906E:296b-13: ru dr'a ksha gdong gcig pa'i rin po che rma med pa lus la btags nas bsrung ba bya ste /
T02TD2906E:296b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:296b-15: mgon po thugs rjes 'chad ba'i lha ;
T02TD2906E:296b-16: / rig sngags rgyal po dge ba can //
T02TD2906E:296b-17: gnod pa thams cad zhi ba'i phyir //
T02TD2906E:296b-18: mgon po khyod kyi byin rlabs mdzod //
T02TD2906E:296b-20: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya ste /
T02TD2906E:296b-21: bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis //
T02TD2906E:296b-22: 'jig rten du ni sangs rgyas myur bar shog //
T02TD2906E:296b-23: 'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston byed cing //
T02TD2906E:296b-24: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las grol //
T02TD2906E:296b-25: zhes dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang /
T02TD2906E:296b-26: bzod par gsol bar bya ste /
T02TD2906E:296b-27: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
T02TD2906E:296b-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:296b-29: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi lha bum pa'i lha dang gcig tu bsres la /
T02TD2906E:296b-30: rma bya'i sgros dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rnams phyis nas khrus kyi gzhong pa bzhag ste /
T02TD2906E:296b-31: ae ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2906E:296b-32: thugs rje can gyi thabs chen gyi //
T02TD2906E:296b-33: zhi yang sems can don du ni //
T02TD2906E:296b-34: dri ma med pa'i khro bor gyur //
T02TD2906E:296b-35: zhes bstod la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags rings kyis kyang mtshams bcad gnas lngar rdo rjes gtug cing byin gyis brlab /
T02TD2906E:296b-37: gzi brjid phung po bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD2906E:296b-38: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzod spur bzhag ste /
T02TD2906E:297a-0: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am @297a * //
T02TD2906E:297a-1: aa bu dzu zhes bya bas mdzod spu bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:297a-2: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya spyi bor bcings te /
T02TD2906E:297a-4: dibta aod ka de au bi sha du na du na h'um zhes bya bas gtsug tor bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:297a-5: rdo rje 'chol ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2906E:297a-6: gu gul gyi dud pas kyang bdug par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:297a-7: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2906E:297a-8: aom badzra aa sha ni h'um phat ces bya bas sran phye dang bag phye de'i lus la btab la /
T02TD2906E:297a-9: sgrub pa'i grogs pos sngar bshad pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa gdon zhing bum pa thams cad kyi lha zhu bar bsams la /
T02TD2906E:297a-10: da bzhin gshegs pa sh'a kya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2906E:297a-11: phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2906E:297a-12: bdud rtsi thab sbyor la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2906E:297a-13: de thams cad kyi mthu dang /
T02TD2906E:297a-14: byin gyi rlabs kyi che ge mo zhes bya ba'i gnod pa dang /
T02TD2906E:297a-15: gdon thams cad zhi ba rgyur cig ces brjod la /
T02TD2906E:297a-16: spyi bo nas rkang ba'i bar du lus thams cad khrus bya'o//
T02TD2906E:297a-17: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sngags lan bdun bzlas pas spyi bor blugs pa dang /
T02TD2906E:297a-18: lan bdun bzlas shing snying gar blugs pa dang /
T02TD2906E:297a-19: lan bdun bzlas pas lte bar blugs par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:297a-20: de nas rma bya'i sgros bya ba cing /
T02TD2906E:297a-21: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa yi //
T02TD2906E:297a-23: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ma rungs pa'i /
T02TD2906E:297a-24: dgra dang bgegs kyang med par shog //
T02TD2906E:297a-25: rkun po la sogs med par shog / mu stegs can las rgyal gyur cig //
T02TD2906E:297a-26: byang chub snying po thob par du //
T02TD2906E:297a-27: bdud sde bzhi yis mi thub cing //
T02TD2906E:297a-28: khro bo mngag gzhug pho nya mo //
T02TD2906E:297a-29: bran la sogs pas bsrung bar shog / gcong rong g-yang sa la sogs dang //
T02TD2906E:297a-30: gdon dang rims nad med par shog / ces byas la rma bya'i sgros bya ba par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:297a-31: de nas rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs lan gnyis gsum bton la khrus lan gsum bya'o //
T02TD2906E:297a-32: de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du /
T02TD2906E:297a-33: de la bsrung ba byas gos bskon nas med tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2906E:297a-34: khro bo rnams kyi phyag mtshan bris pa'am //
T02TD2906E:297a-35: lugs ma spyi bor gdags par bya'o //
T02TD2906E:297a-36: de nas bdag nyid kyar sngar bshad pa bzhin du bsrung ba byas la ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:297b-0: khyod kyis sems can don kun @297b mdzad //
T02TD2906E:297b-1: ces bya ba la sogs pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2906E:297b-2: dam tshig sems dpa' yang stong ba nyid du zhu ba dang rdul tshon gyi lha'i dman ma yang chu bo la sogs par dor bar bya'o /
T02TD2906E:297b-3: de nas gnas de na gnas pa'i 'byung bo dang /
T02TD2906E:297b-5: phyogs skyong la gtor ma byin la /
T02TD2906E:297b-6: nus na sbyin bdag dang slob ma bsrung ba'i phyir sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2906E:297b-7: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2906E:297b-8: rig 'dzin sngon gyi mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2906E:297b-9: ci gsungs lhag chad med par ni //
T02TD2906E:297b-10: rang bzor ma byas bzod gsol med //
T02TD2906E:297b-11: legs grub rig pa mchog dag dang //
T02TD2906E:297b-12: rab grub gsang ba spyi rgyud dang //
T02TD2906E:297b-13: phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bskur las //
T02TD2906E:297b-14: yon blangs dge rtsa bsngo rgyu med //
T02TD2906E:297b-15: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i cho ga rin po che mig thur zhes bya ba /
T02TD2906E:297b-16: slob dpon sh'u rangga warmas mdzad pa rdzog so//
